high is the gigantic stalagmite and doest it have name describe the colour of the gigantic stalagmite 2 how did this gigantic stalagmite grow and how long did it take take a picture of youself with gps showing the infotable in the background see reference point for infotable spot the picture is optional slovenscina splosne informacije in geologija vilenica je najstarejsa turisticno urejena jama v evropi ime je dobila po meglicah nad vhodom ki so videti kot ples mitoloskih bitij vil zato so bili ljudje prepricani da v jami zivijo vile jama je sestavljena iz treh morfolosko bistvenih delov ki so bili preoblikovani zaradi vode in ponorov kaksnega obcasnega potoka vilenica je vec kot 800 m dolga jama z denivelacijo dobrih 180 m jama je bogato okrasena z vrsto lepih kapnikov znana je po velikih dvoranah in bogati dekoraciji sigastih tvorb se posebej so lepe jamske zavese in velikanski stalagmit s premerom 10 metrov v njegovem spodnjem delu verjetno najvecja kapniska tvorba v sloveniji prvi del jame je bil mocno preoblikovan s ponorom osrednji del je manjsi zadnji del daje vtis velikega posevnega zloma v zadnjem delu jame lahko najdemo izjemni stalagmit stalagmit je kapnik ki raste iz tal in nastaja s kapljanjem vode iz stropa in izlocanjem kalcijevega karbonata iz nje tretji del se zakljuci s fabrisovim rovom ki je dostopen samo jamarjem v tem delu so rdeci stalaktiti prekriti z belimi helictiti to so apnencaste tvorbe ki spreminjajo svojo rast od vertikalne v vec stopnjah zato imajo skrivljeno ali kotno obliko ki daje vtis kot da so brez teznosti v tej jami so narejeni iz igel kalcita lahko tudi aragonita so morda ena od najbolj obcutljivih jamskih tvorb ze ob najmanjsem stiku se jih lahko zmecka ali zdrobi zato se jih v turisticnih jamah tudi redko vidi na dosegu roke obiskovalcev oblike helictitov opisujejo glede na obliko kot trak zaga palica kodrcki krompircek toda v tej jami so podobni metuljem glavni del jame se je razvil znotraj obmocja razpoke ne glede na to kako so bile prvotno razporejeni prehodi znotraj tega obmocja je na mestih prelomnic prislo do zrusitev stropov prelomnica je zlom ali prekinitev v skalni masi do katere pride zaradi vzdolznih zlomov ki so posledica zemeljskega gibanja zanimivo je da je usmeritev vidnih delov skoraj povsem pravokotna na mlajse podzemne vode razlike je mogoce pojasniti z veliko starostjo jame zaradi katerih je dokaj mozno da so bile podzemne vode ki so jih oblikovale usmerjene drugace kot so danes domnevajo da je danasnja jama samo del nekdanjega vecjega jamskega sistema kakorkoli zaradi intenzivnih podorov so podatki o prvotnem izgledu podzemlja v tem delu na veliko delih povsem zabrisani dostop do jame od glavne ceste je jama oddaljena priblizno 200m pred vhodom je urejeno la mine de plomb argentifere de la plagne situation et mode de gisement le nom de la plagne a acquis une notoriete nationale et meme internationale depuis que la creation en 1963 dune station up to date y attire une foule de fervents combien parmi ceux qui se livrent avec griserie a leur sport favori se doutentils quaudessous de leurs gracieuses arabesques la montagne est taraudee par tout un reseau de puits et galeries quy a creuse un contingent de mineurs voue a des taches qui comptent parmi les plus rebutantes les ruisseaux de la lovatiere a louest et de larc a lest enserrent un interfluve arrondi qui seleve de leur confluence au hameau de la roche vers 1 550 metres jusqua la crete des colosses 2 141 m et que tranche la limite entre la foret de coniferes et la prairie alpine son rebord oriental recele un gisement de plomb argentifere connu depuis des temps immemoriaux et exploite jusquen fevrier 1973 par la societe le nickelpenarroya geologie nous sommes ici sur la ligne de contact entre la nappe permocarbonifere ere du paleozoique il y a environ 300 millions dannees dite brianconnaise dans laquelle est evide le berceau tarin et la nappe de la vanoise et du mont pourri qui lui succede vers lest le passage se marque sur lemplacement meme de la mine par une discordance soulignee par des breches tectoniques a la premiere de ces nappes se rattache un synclinal de schistes verts ou violets finement feuilletes et a la surface luisante et talqueuse attribues au permien le flanc occidental redresse a la verticale apparait donc en affleurement tandis que vers lest le pendage variable mais compris entre 20 et 45deg traduit lamorce dun anticlinal gonflant le houiller sousjacent mais profondement enfoui sous la niasse des cargneules calcaires cristallins gypses et dolomies de la nappe chevauchante de la vanoise le remplissage du synclinal consiste en quartzites tantot finement broyes jusqua etre reduits en sables tantot cimentes en solides amas extrait du livre de louis chabert les traces du soussol durant la ballade a la plagne plusieurs pierres fort differentes sont visibles sur les chemins et les coupes de roches les quartzites blancs legerement translucides sont ceux qui contiennent des filons il y a egalement des pierres vertes et des granits voici une liste de roches que vous verrez sur les chemins de la plagne des micaschistes versicolores verts a violaces chloriteux et quartzeux a niveaux conglomeratiques ou gneissiques ils constituent le groupe dambin de jganne anciennement confondus avec les schistes volcanodetritiques que lon connait dans le permien du brianconnais plus meridional on leur attribue maintenant un age paleozoique ordovicien des micaschistes gris de larpont a ambin = groupe de la clarea de jganne ils hebergent par places des intercalations de roches vertes plus ou moins volcaniques dage paleozoique des micaschistes superieurs gris et noirs parfois pyriteux et charbonneux a patine rouille ils comportent des passees de grauwackes et de prasinites des micaschistes moyens alternes de bancs quartzeux anciennes ignimbrites reposant sur une roche grenue verdatre rapportee a un ancien gabbro des micaschistes inferieurs formant un complexe rubane a alternances de roches vertes anciennes spilites et de strates quartzeuses extrait de geoalpes de maurice gidon pour logger valablement cette earthcache dites moi par mail via mon profil quel numero est sur la plaque bleue de la cabine electirique quel cafe a gauche de la mine quel est le nom du chalet a gauche de la mine quelle lettre sur le chalet a droite de la mine quelle est la couche de couleur grise sur le panneau informatif quel terme geologique est utilise pour les sables quel pourcentage de plomb dans le minerai a lextraction une photo de vous a lentree de la mine est toujours la bienvenue location and mode of occurrence the name of la plagne acquired a national and even international reputation since the inception in 1963 the station attracts a crowd of enthusiasts how many of those who engage in their favorite sport suspect that below their graceful arabesques the mountain is tapped by a network of shafts and tunnels dug by a contingent of miners dedicated to tasks that are among the most repulsive the streams lovatiere of the western and eastern arc enclose a round interfluve rising from their confluence the hamlet of la roche 1550 meters to the crest of the colossus 2141 m and slice the boundary between the coniferous forest and alpine meadow its eastern edge holds a silverlead deposit that has been known for time immemorial and operated until february 1973 by le nickelpenarroya geology we are here on the line of contact between the water from the brianconnais 300 million years ago which is called the cradle an hollow tarin and ground of the vanoise and mont pourri succeeding to the east the transition is marked on the site of the mine by discrepancy highlighted by tectonic breccias at the first of these sheets relates a syncline green or purple shale finely laminated and glistening surface talc attributed to permian the western flank upright vertically thus appears flush while the dip to the east variable but included between 20 and 45 deg reflecting the start of an anticline inflating the carboniferous underlying but deeply buried under the mass of cargneules crystalline limestone gypsum and dolomite of the water of overlapping vanoise the filling consists of quartzite of the syncline sometimes finely ground to be reduced to sand sometimes cemented solid mass traces of the basement during the ride to la plagne several stones are visible on very different paths and rock cuts the slightly translucent white quartzites are those that contain veins there are also green stones and granite here is a list of rocks that you see on the road to la plagne variegated mica schists green to purplish chlorite and quartz with conglomeratic levels or gneissic they are the group ambin by j ganne formerly confused with volcanoclastic shale which is known in the permian of southernmost briancon they are now issuing paleozoic ordovician the white mica the arpont to ambin = group of clara by j ganne they host some places intercalations greenstone more or less volcanic paleozoic age the upper mica gray and black pyritic and sometimes smoky patina rust they include past and greywackes prasinites the mica means alternating quartz bench old ignimbrites based on a grainy greenish rock related to a former gabbro the lower mica forming a complex with alternating banded greenstone spilites old and quartz layers to log this properly earthcache tell me by mail via my profile what is the layer of gray on the information board what term is used for geological sands what percentage of lead in ore extraction what is the number on the blue plate on the electiric house written below edelweiss what pub is left of the mine what name is on the building left from the mine what letter is on the building on the right side of the mine a picture of you in front of the entry of the mine is always welcome thanks to draculix for the new questions free counters

waterberging en ecologische verbindingszone molenbeek situatie de molenbeek ligt tussen roosendaal en de belgische grens de beek ontspringt in belgie vanuit de kleine aa en de wildertse beek loopt stroomafwaarts door het stedelijk gebied van roosendaal en mondt uiteindelijk uit in de roosendaalse haven de beek stroomt grotendeels door een open agrarisch landschap en is in het verleden rechtgetrokken uitzondering hierop is het trace tussen de belgische grens en nispen waar de molenbeek nog meandert bij hoge afvoeren ontstaan met name ten zuiden van roosendaal en op belgisch grondgebied wateroverlast de waterkwaliteit van de beek is mede door lozingen en overstorten uit belgie ontoereikend de molenbeek is aangewezen als ecologische verbindingszone waterdoelen de oevers en aangrenzende gronden van de molenbeek inrichten als ecologische verbindingszone langs de beek ruimte creeren voor waterberging stuwen vispasseerbaar maken doelstelling vanuit kaderrichtlijn water waterkwaliteit verbeteren doelstelling vanuit kaderrichtlijn water

the cave of st john is located in the municipality of domusnovas province of carboniaiglesias sardinia the cave is a beautiful example of karst the karst phenomena were generated by the flow of a subterraneous river that caused the collapse of limestone rock masses the grotto has been recognized natural monument in 1999 and is unique in italy third in the world after france and australia to be traveled by car now closed to traffic and only open to pedestrians entrance is free and the cave is illuminated from 900 am to 900 pm the main branch at street level is 850 m long and is fully crossed by the river st john that drains the mountain valleys it is characterized by stalactites and stalagmites in large rooms the largest of these is situated near the north in addition to the main part of the grotto branches on two levels accessible only to experts make it a 2000 meter long cave they consist of a series of tunnels and passages with the presence of underground lakes and siphons numerous artifacts have been found inside the cave mainly of shards of pottery indicating that the cave was used as a shelter as an evidence of this there are the remains of prenuragic massive walls which aimed to fortify the entrances in the south the walls are still visible near the northern entrance thanks to favorable climatic conditions an abundant floral hygrophyte has developed to complete this earth cache please do the following 1 take a guess about the height of the northern monumental entrance to the valley of oridda from street level to the top email me your answer send message 2 without water karst phenomena wouldnt exist estimate the current flow rate of the river san giovanni and tell me your answer meters per second in your email 3 cross the cave and count the street lamps on both sides of the road between the bollards at the entrances and tell me the number in your email 4 mention in your log whether youve been there alone or with how many others you have visited this location taking a picture of you and your gps in front of the cave or inside is optional but id appreciate any picture uploaded with your log enjoy la grotta di san giovanni e ubicata nel territorio comunale di domusnovas provincia di carboniaiglesias in sardegna la grotta e un bellesempio di fenomeno carsico il fenomeno carsico che la genero e dovuto allo scorrere di un fiume sottorraneo che ne provoco il cedimento di una massa calcarea rocciosa la grotta e stato riconosciuta monumento naturale in 1999 e unica in italia terza in tutto il mondo dopo francia e australia ad essere percorribile in auto ora chiusa al traffico lingresso e gratuito e la grotta e illuminata 9002100 il ramo principale livello stradale lungo 850 metri interamente attraversato dal rio di san giovanni che raccoglie le acque delle vallate a monte e caratterizzato da ampie sale da grandi concrezioni a vaschetta la piu grande di queste concrezioni si trova in prossimaita delluscita nord e da stalattiti e da stalagmiti oltre al ramo principale la grotta si sviluppa su altri due livelli accessibili solo agli esperti rendendo la grotta lunga 2000 metri sono costituite da una serie di gallerie e passaggi con la presenza di laghi sotterranei e sifoni numerosi reperti sono stati rinvenuti allinterno della grotta si tratta principalmente di cocci di vasellame a testimonianza che la cavita era utilizzata come rifugio a testimonianza di cio sono anche i resti delle possenti mura preistoriche che aveno lo scopo di chiudere fortificando gli ingressi nord e sud nel sud le pareti sono ancora visibili vicino allingresso del nord grazie alle favorevoli condizioni climatiche un hygrophyte abbondante floreali si e sviluppata per registrare la cache potrebbe essere necessario effettuare le seguenti operazioni 1 prendere una supposizione circa laltezza del monumentale ingresso settentrionale alla valle di oridda dal livello della strada verso lalto invia le risposte via email send message 2 senza fenomeni carsici acqua non esisterebbe stimare il tasso attuale portata del rio san giovanni e dimmi la tua risposta metri al secondo nella tua email 3 attraversate la grotta e contare i lampioni su entrambi i lati della strada tra i dissuasori allingresso e dimmi il numero nella tua email 4 menzione nel registro se ci sei stato da solo o con quanti altri che hanno visitato questa posizione imagini sono naturalmente i benvenuti scattare una foto di voi e il vostro gps davanti alla grotta o e dentro opzionale ma io apprezzo ogni immagine caricata con il vostro log buon divertimento

blegnymine le terril le charbonnage dargenteautrembleur est situe sur le territoire de blegny au nordest de liege dans lavantpays de herve installe en pleine campagne a une centaine de metres audessus du niveau de la meuse il constitue la derniere concession houillere du nord du bassin liegeois par rapport a dautres sieges dextraction argenteautrembleur etait caracterise par une relativement faible profondeur certaines couches affleurant meme la campagne voisine linteret du site reside dans sa reconversion originale en domaine touristique et dans la preservation de deux puits depoques differentes xixeme et xxeme siecle le plus recent toujours en service donne acces aux galeries souterraines des etages 30 et 60 metres ouvert aux visites

jazvinska jaskyna jazvinska jaskyna v tribecskom pohori nazyvana tiez debnarova jaskyna sa nachadza pri osade debnarov stal patriacej do obce mala lehota prva zmienka o jazvinskej jaskyni pochadza z roku 1893 od andreja kmeta vynikajuceho botanika a archeologa patri k najznamejsim puklinovoriecnym jaskyniam v kostolianskolehotskom krase s dutinami vertikalnej zony s pohybujucimi sa krasovymi vodami a modelacnymi podzemnymi tokmi vznikla vplyvom vodnych cinitelov na puklinach vo vapencoch stredneho triasu tvoriacich obalovu seriu tribeca tiahne sa vodorovne vo vapencovom masive do vzdialenosti 44m a pokracuje uzkou puklinou jej vyzdobu tvoria skrasovatene pukliny a sintrova vypln pre nepriechodnost podzemnych priestorov a zanesenemu dnu splavenymi sedimentmi z jej povrchu bola jaskyna prekopavana v rokoch 1973 1974 1975 1988 a 1989 jazvinska jaskyna dnes patri k najkrajsim podzemnym prirodnym krasam tribecskeho pohoria z jaskyne tiez pochadza nalez rimskej importovanej keramiky terry sigillaty z mladsej doby rimskej najdeny crep terry sigillaty je z prelomu 2 a 3 stor po kr a pochadza z dielni v rheinzaberne zdroj informacii <url> <url> podmienky zalogovania cache prilozit k logu fotografiu seba alebo svojho gps pred vchodom do jaskyne dobrovolne poslat mi email cez profil s odpovedami na nasledovne otazky nazov este aspon jednej jaskyne v pohori tribec preco tu nieje dokonale vyvinuta forma krasu s typickou jaskynnou vyzdobou ako sa nazyva utvar po pravej strane pri vchode do jazvinskej jaskyne na ktory sa viaze slovenska povest zmerajte a napiste priblizny rozmer utvaru popiste farbu vapenca pri vchode a co si myslite co ju sposobuje vlastnymi slovami neposielajte to do logu taketo logy budu vymazane odpovede zasielajte cez profil s logovanim nemusite cakat na odpoved ak bude nieco zle ozvem sa upozornenie vstup do jaskyne bez povolenia je zakazany jazvinska cave the jazvinska cave called also the debnarova cave is spread at the debnarov stal settlement that is a part of the mala lehota municipality the jazvinska cave was first mentioned in 1893 by andrej kmet an excellent botanist and archaeologist it belongs to the best known riftriverine caves in kostolianskolehotska karst with vertical cavities with flowing solution waters and modelling subsurface flows the cave was formed under water factors impact on the rifts in the middle trias limestones which build the covering sequel of the tribec mountain it spreads 44m horizontal in the limestone massif and goes on with a narrow rift some solution crevices and sinter filling build the cave decoration because of impassibility of the subsurface spaces and because of the bottom sludged by sediment runoffs from its surface the cave was retunneled in 1973 1974 1975 1988 and 1989 nowadays the jazvinska cave counts to the most beautiful underground nature beauties of the tribec mountain chain also a finding of the ancient roman pottery terra sigillata from the earlier roman era comes from this cave the found terra sigillata potsherd is dated back to the turn of the 2nd into the 3rd cent ad and comes from workshops in rheinzabern source of information <url> dies ist der dritte cache in einer porzellan cache serie jedermann weiss dass sich gossi der drache der auch auf dem wappen der stadt gossau zu finden ist mit seinen freunden im buechenwald herumtummelt aber weisst du auch wo er wohnt dieser cache fuhrt dich zu ihm bist du mutig genug um ihm zu begegnen um zu seiner hohle zu gelangen musst du mehrmals einen bach ohne brucken uberqueren eine parkmoglichkeit gibt es bei n 47 25217 e 009 16252 sei mutig und stark weitere caches in dieser serie spitzmaus giftzwerg alli mini camelus dromedarius zwillinge ewigi liabi uhuu this is the third cache of its kind of a porcelain cache series everybody knows that gossi the dragon who is also featured on the official flag of the town of gossau is playing around in the buechenwald with his friends but do you know where he lives this cache takes you to him are you courageous enough to meet him to get to his cave you have to cross a little stream without bridges several times parking possible at n 47 25217 e 009 16252 be strong and courageous other caches of this series spitzmaus giftzwerg alli mini camelus dromedarius zwillinge ewigi liabi uhuu

the odvasko cave is the favorite place of bats for mating therefore this is protected by the law theres a high rock above the cave can be nice to get up there in the summer when its not snowy of course leave the car near n47 17039 e17 42602 245 m and go up on the footpath called boroszlan korut naming from a species of flower at n47 17347 e17 42918 365 m turn to the right follow the painted sign on the trunks of the trees red cave on white background the cache is in the hollow of an old tree covered by bark after hiding the cache again walk further to the cave you can get back to the starting point by walking down the stairs enjoy the silence of the place

le antiche cave di tufo e pozzolana si trovano allinterno della tenuta di tormarancia oggi inserita nel sistema del parco regionale dellappia antica oltre allimportanza storicoarcheologica la tenuta di tor marancia rappresenta con i suoi ampi orizzonti un luogo di elevato valore paesaggistico e infatti uno dei pochissimi lembi esistenti di agro romano ormai quasi completamente inglobato nel tessuto urbano della capitale il paesaggio leggermente ondulato altitudini comprese tra i 15 ed i 50 metri slm i pianori sommitali le scarpate e la presenza di zone umide permettono una biodiversita elevatissima in rapporto al luogo siamo praticamente al centro di roma a ridosso di quartieri intensamente abitati le cave gia esistenti ai tempi dellimpero vennero utilizzate soprattutto nel 900 per la grande espansione edilizia della capitale lo scenario e spettacolare e non a caso e stato utilizzato per film western magari cercando di evitare di inquadrare sullo sfondo il tamburo della tomba di cecilia metella nel 1992 iniziarono gli scavi archeologici della villa dei numisi che furono pero rinterrati in seguito il sentiero che vi portera alla cache passa proprio a pochi metri dal luogo degli scavi ma oggi vedrete solo una collina e tanta vegetazione ha ricoperto quella parte del parco

von der costa rei ist es es nicht weit in dieses wanderparadies am monte dei sette fratelli parken konnt ihr am forstamt von dort konnt ihr auf verschiedenen wegen zum cache gelangen eine sehr schone wanderung findet ihr hier sie fuhrt euch vorbei an den ruinen eines klosters uber den sattel punte dei sette fratelli und zu einer grotte in welcher der cache versteckt ist in der warmen jahreszeit startet ihr am besten bei sonnenaufgang nehmt auch genugend wasser mit from costa rei it is a short drive to the hikers paradise at monte dei sette fratelli parking is available at the forestry office there start various trails to the cache a very nice tour you can find here this trip will bring you to the old ruins of a monastery to the mountain saddle punte dei sette fratelli und to the cave where the cache ist hidden in summer time start at sunrise mind to take enough water with you

every year we spend a lot of time in discovering slovenia geo caching is a very helpful tool to find many great places there which you normaly do not find in a tourist guide so we decided to add another very special place to the long list of sites to visit we were surprized that one had placed a cache there yet eng the krizna jama cave krizna cave is worldwide known karst cave its specialities are underground lakes with sinters barriers extremely interesting site of cave bears bones and naturally preserved environment for animals the length of all passages is over 8 km 6 miles air temperature inside the cave is constant through the whole year +8degc the cave drains away water from the southern side of bloke plateau towards eastern margin of cerknica field krizna jama is fourth in the world in number of actual cave animals 44 different species during winter there are about 400 hibernating bats of 7 different species in the cave the most frequent are lesser horseshoe bats rhinolophus hipposideros visitors can see some of interesting sites in the cave in one hour to experience secrets of intact underground you should make reservation of the long visit 4 hours slo unfortunately my slovenian is very limited if you are a native speaker and would like to add a description in slovenian please contact me via geocachingcom i will add your description to the listing happy caching

target area no spoiler please de informationen zur hohlenburgruine reinegg die koordinaten fuhren dich zum einstigen eingang der burg reinegg eine halbe stunde sudostlich von st johann am bruckl johannserberg wo nach der einmundung des gortschitzbaches in die grossere gurk sich das thal langs den sudwestlichen auslaufern der saualpe gegen die trixner schlosser und gegen volkermarkt zu offnet stand einst auf einem hohen und steilen aus dem schiefergebirge aufragenden urkalkfelsen am linken ufer der gurk die veste burg reinek von welcher nur mehr geringe mauerreste vorhanden sind unterhalb des burgfelsen liegt zwischen demselben und der brausenden gurk das gehoft reinek zwanziger 1873 s249 zwanziger vermutet dass die burg wohl schon im 17 jahrhundert verfallen und verschollen war bei kohla finden sich zur ruine folgende angaben reinegg rainegg nordlich der reinegger gurkbrucke sudlich von bruckl ort reisdorf gemeinde waisenberg gerichtsbezirk bezirkshauptmannschaft volkermarkt 1973 grenzanderung gemeindestrukturreform karnten rechtsnachfolger stadtgemeinde volkermarkt hohlenburgruine gut erkennbare befestigung in der felswand oberhalb der reinegger brucke wahrscheinlich schon in urgeschichtlicher zeit bewohnt unterhalb fuhrte die romerstrasse vorbei erstmals 1176 als castrum rinecke genannt kohla 1973 s 272f castrum rinecke kann mit eck an der rein oder an einer flachen mulde ubersetzt werden sagt joachim eichert vom landesarchiv kartnen der kleinen zeitung es handelte sich wohl um eine fluchtburg die kontinuierlich ausgebaut und baulich verandert wurde altverlassen und langst vergessen um die alten gemauer ranken sich zahlreiche mythen und legenden die von heidnischen frauen und schatzsuchern berichten die sage hat von den wenigen mauertrummern der alten veste besitz ergriffen und lasst weisse wilde oder hadische frauen in den hohlen dieses urkalkfelsen hausen einst erschien wie alte leute erzahlen eine solche wilde frau beim gutsbesitzer reinegger am fusse des felsen und bat mit flehentlichen geberden es moge doch jemand mitgehen da wie es schien oben jemand krank sei es wagte dies aber niemand und sie weinte beim fortgehen bitterlich uber die hartherzigkeit der menschen ergotzlicher ist eine schatzgrabergeschichte die sich in den alten ruinen abspielte es trieben langere zeit hindurch schatzgraber oben ihr wesen die sich in der nacht durch feuer und rauch verriethen worauf der pfleger von trixen den berg umstellte sie abfassen liess und nach klagenfurt einlieferte sie kehrten aber bald wieder und setzten ihre beschwerliche arbeit zu deren glucklicher vollendung sie eine messe lesen liessen nun offentlich fort ihre muhe und ausdauer wurde belohnt denn sie hoben endlich den schweren schatz aus betrachtlicher tiefe in gestalt eines muhlsteines unter dem zwei menschliche vorderarmknochen kreuzweise lagen auch der stein wurde auseinander geschlagen ob er nicht in seinem innern noch schatze berge es fand sich aber nichts vor als eben steintrummer und so zogen denn die beutelustigen schatzgraber enttauscht wieder ihres weges furbass zwanziger 1873 s252 eine weitere sage zur hohlenburg befasst sich ebenfalls mit den geheimnisvollen frauen von reinegg deren seelen noch immer umherwandern und auf erlosung warten zu den weissen wilden frauen gibt es einen aufschlussreichen wikipediaeintrag salige frau die sage wird von georg graber erzahlt die saligen frauen von reinegg kohla franz xaver metnitz gustaf adolf von moro gotbert 1973 karntner burgenkunde ergebnisse und hinweise in ubersicht erster teil karntens burgen schlosser ansitze und wehrhafte statten ein beitrag zur siedlungstopographie in moro gotbert hrsg aus forschung und kunst 17 s272f zwanziger gustav adolf 1873 mittheilungen aus dem gortschitzthale in carinthia zeitschrift fur vaterlandskunde belehrung und unterhaltung 63 s249252

grotta dello smeraldo the grotta dello smerlado italian for emerald cave is a sea cave its located in the comune conca dei marini in the province of salerno campania on the amalfi coast the amalfi coast is one of the most famous and beautiful stretchs of coastline in italy it is one of several sea caves worldwide that is flooded with a brilliant blue or emerald light the quality and nature of the color in each cave is determined by the unique lighting conditions in that particular cave the grotto which is located along the amalfi coast is partly filled with water the surface area of the water measures roughly 45 x 32 meters unlike the more famous blue grotto a few miles to the west on capri there is another earthcache the grotta dello smeraldo has no natural outlet above the waterline the only opening to the outside world is just below the water level refracted sunlight entering the cavern through the opening gives the water its characteristic emerald glow during daylight hours the absence of a natural opening above the waterline meant that the grottos existence remained unknown for many years so the cave was discovered by a fisherman named luigi buoncore in 1932 who took a look through a hole on the rock geology the cliff was formed through erosion the amalficoast exists of limestone so the sea eroded the cliff because of the continuous waves which are bouncing through the stone in the beginning of the emerald caveit wasnt in the sea it was above the former sea level during this age stalactites and stalagmites took shape then the sea level rised so the cave slowly was partially flooted up by the sea today the former entrance is a tunnel under the water where the light comes into the cave and named it emerald cave because of the color of the water the grotto is accessible from strada statale 163 the main road along the amalfi coast in front of the entrance to the cave there is a parking area for parking your cachemobile then youve to walk through the gate to elevators which are bringing you to the sea level you can reach to the grotta dello smeraldo also by boat infact from the amalfis harbour many boats go to and for the cave each hour if you want to take a look inside you have to pay for it but then a guide let you sit down on a boat and rows you through the cave then you can see the emerald light unfortunately the guide just speaks english and so he sits quiet in the boat and doesnt talk with you but another guide sings in the cave so that it sounds right good in it to log this earthcache please email me maxk the answers to the following questions using the profile link above please write in german or english im not able to talk italian 1how high is the cavern roof above the sea level 2estimate the high of the entrance through which you would walk if you take a look inside the caveyou dont have to go inside but using the elevator doesnt cost anything 3when is the best time to visit the grotta dello smeraldo because the light can be seen very well 4how long is the underwatertunnel optional conditions please post a picture of you andor your gps near the area in front of the caveentrance but watch out not to show the entrance on your pic a pic of the cave inside would be nice too have fun die grotta dello smerlado italienisch fur smaragdgrotte ist eine seegrotte in der kommune conca dei marini in der provinz salerno campania an der amalfikuste diese ist eine der schonsten und bekanntesten kustenabschnitte in italien die grotte ist eine von den seehohlen weltweit die mit einem wunderschonen strahlend blauen oder smaragdgrunen licht durchflutet wird die qualitat und intensitat der farbe wird durch die einzigartige lichtverhaltnisse in der jeweiligen hohle bestimmt die grotte ist teilweise mit wasser gefullt die oberflache des wassers misst rund 45 x 32 meter im gegensatz zur beruhmten blauen grotte auf capri hat die grotta dello smeraldo keine naturliche offnung oberhalb der wasserlinie wahrend der tagesstunden gibt das licht was durch eine offnung unter wasser hereinstromt dem wasser sein smaragdgrunes leuchten aufgrund dass es nur eine offnung unter wasser gab hiess naturlich dass die hohle lange unentdeckt blieb so wurde die hohle erst 1932 von einem fischer namens luigi buoncore welcher durch ein loch im felsen guckte entdeckt geologie die ganze amalfikuste wurde durch erosion erschaffen die kuste besteht aus kalkstein welche durch die kontinuierlichen wellen des meeres welche gegen die kuste schlagen erodiert am anfang der geschichte der smaragdgrotte war diese uber wasser sodass stalaktiten und stalagmiten gestalt annahmen dann aber stieg der meeresspiegel sodass die hohle allmahlich uberflutet wurde heute ist der ehemalige eingang unter wasser dort kommt das licht hindurch welches der grotte ihren namen gab die grotte ist uber die strada statale 163 der hauptstrasse entlang der amalfikuste zu erreichen vor dem eingangsschild ist auch ein parkplatz wo ihr euer auto abstellen konnt dann musst ihr durch den kleinen torbogen gehen und mit den fahrstuhlen auf meeresniveau fahren von dort aus ist es nur noch ein paar schritt zum eingang der hohle ihr konnt aber auch von amalfi aus auf ein boot umsatteln und euch zur grotte schippern lassen wenn ihr euch die grotte angucken wollt musst ihr jedoch dafur bezahlen wenn ihr dies tut werdet ihr mit einem boot durch die hohle gerudert und konnt das schimmern des lichts hautnah erleben leider kann der guide bloss italienisch wenn ich das richtig erfasst habe sprechen sodass er nur stumm euch rumrudert ein anderer singt aber auch mal und erzahlt etwas uber die stalagmiten und stalaktiten um diesen earthcache loggen zu durfen beantworte bitte folgende fragen in einer mail an mich maxk 1wie hoch ist die hohle uber dem meeresspiegel 2 schatze die hohe des eingang durch welchen du gehen wurdest wenn du die hohle anschauen willstihr musst nicht in die hohle hinein sondern sollt bloss von aussen gucken und das benutzen des fahrstuhles ist nicht verbindlich oder kostenpflichtig 3 wann kann man das licht am besten sehen tageszeit nicht nur weil die ganzen anderen touristen da essen sind 4 wie lang ist der unterwassertunnel durch welchen das licht fallt optional mache bitte ein foto von dir undoder deinem gps auf der ebene vor dem eingang der hohle achte aber darauf den hohleneingang nicht auf dem bild zu haben ein bild von der hohle innendrin wurde auch nett sein viel spass in costiera amalfitana a 5 km da amalfi nellincantevole baia di conca dei marini si trova la grotta dello smeraldo scoperta nel 1932 da un pescatore locale la grotta dello smeraldo di conca de marini deve il suo nome alla particolare colorazione assunta dallacqua che riflette la luce che filtra dalle rocce di quel tratto di costiera amalfitana creando effetti cromatici dalle strabilianti sfumature dal blu cobalto al turchese al verde smeraldo la grotta dello smeraldo che nellantichita non era invasa dallacqua e larga circa 30 metri per 60 e alta 24 metri nei punti piu alti ed e ricca di colonne stalattiti e stalagmiti dalle forme bizzarreche creano un ambiente incantato tappa obbligata per i turisti che visitano ogni anno la magnifica costiera amalfitana lingresso della grotta dello smeraldo e raggiungibile dalla ss 163 la suggestiva strada panoramica che va da salerno fino a positano successivamente mediante lascensore o lapposita scala si raggiunge linterno della cavita naturale da tutte le principali localita della costiera amalfitana e sorrentina ci sono poi traghetti che organizzano escursioni guidate oltre la possibilita di affittare zattere condotte da marinai che guidano il turista in questa breve lescursione dura circa 30 minuti ma affascinante avventura nelle sue acque e possibile altresi ammirare un affascinante e originale presepe subacqueo in ceramica di vietri sul mare posto sul fondo della grotta dello smeraldo a circa 4 metri di profondita ogni anno nel periodo natalizio dei sub si immergono nelle acque cristalline della costiera amalfitana e adagiano il bambino gesu sul fondale della grotta dal 2005 poi su iniziativa dellazienda di soggiorno e turismo di amalfi si organizza nel periodo estivo per incrementare e diversificare lofferta turistica della costiera amalfitana una originale kermesse intitolata le magie alla grotta dello smeraldo una straordinaria miscellanea di eventi dalla musica al teatro al cabaret che si alternano sul piazzale antistante la la grotta trasformato per loccasione in una vera e propria piazza sullo splendido mare della costiera amalfitana il tutto condito dalla degustazioni dei prodotti tipici della costiera tra tutti le sfogliatelle santa rosa inventate alcuni secoli fa dalle suore dellomonimo convento di conca dei marini geologia grotta dello smeraldo ha karst tipico ed elementi di caverne marini allinizio la caverna fu al di sopra del mare e durante questeta le stalattiti e le stalagmiti presero la forma lentamente quando il livello del mare rised sulla costa la caverna fu parzialmente flooted su dal mare oggi la caverna e collegata al mare attraverso un tunnel 12 mts a lungo e a 4 mts in profondita per loggare questa earthcache per favore dovete inviare una email a me maxk le risposte alle seguenti domande usando il link al profilo di cui sopra per favore scrivete in tedesco o in inglese non parlo italiano 1quanto e alto il soffitto della caverna sul livello del mare 2stimate laltezza dellentrata attraverso la quale dovrete passare se volete dare unocchiata allinterno della grotta non dovete entrare dentro ma usando lascensore non costa niente 3quando e il periodo di tempo migliore per visitare la grotta dello smeraldo affinche si possa vedere meglio la luce 4quanto e lungo il tunnel sottomarino condizioni opzionali opzionalmente pubblicate per favore una foto di voi eo il vostro gps vicino allarea di fronte allentrata della grotta ma badate di non mostrare lentrata nella vostra foto anche una vostra foto allinterno della grotta sarebbe carina

origine en 1870 joseph melotte sinstalla a grosbois cetait un fermier mais grosbois etant a lepoque un but de promenade il ouvrit un debit de boissons et installa un jeu de quilles cest alors que son epouse tomba gravement malade atteinte dune pneumonie venerant la vierge joseph melotte lui promet de lui construire un sanctuaire si son epouse guerit son voeu fut exauce tout savoir avec ses sept fils joseph melotte amasse les pierres dans les fagnes de fagnoulx de baugnez de chivremont le 12 octobre 1912 il pose la premiere pierre la construction va durer deux ans en 1914 la grotte est terminee et une statue de nd de lourdes en provenance de liege y est installee en ces temps de guerre la grotte devient un lieu de pelerinage vers la fin de la guerre le representant de la prusse voulut faire enlever cette vierge dorigine wallonne mais la fermete de joseph melotte lemporta lors de loffensive des ardennes grosbois pris entre les deux fronts fut pratiquement aneanti la grotte resta inebranlablement intacte elle est encore aujourdhui lobjet de pelerinage des villages de waimes et thirimont

it grotta allonda si trova a circa 700 metri di altezza alle pendici del monte matanna la grotta lunga e stretta si trova alla base di unampia parete rocciosa dalla cui sommita scendono rivoli e cascatelle dacqua che rendono il posto davvero suggestivo la caverna e attualmente oggetto di studio poiche sono stati ritrovati al suo interno reperti preistorici tra cui anche ossa umane il luogo e suggestivo oltre che per il paesaggio anche per lacustica in alcuni punti e nitidissimo il fenomeno delleco inoltre in occasione di inverni particolarmente rigidi alcune cascatelle gelano e lacqua nebulizzata che si posa su erba ed alberi si trasforma in uno strato vetrato rendendo latmosfera veramente incantata oltre alla grotta principale ve ne sono anche altre piu piccole lungo la parete sulla quale sono presenti anche alcuni brevi percorsi attrezzati per larrampicata sportiva per raggiungere grotta allonda si parte da trescolli frazione di casoli si prosegue oltre il paese fino ad incontrare un divieto di accesso parcheggiare qui e proseguire a piedi ma e possibile anche lasciare lauto piu avanti oltre al divieto in una delle numerose piazzole presenti ai lati della strada poco prima di una sbarra allaltezza di una piazzola si imbocca a destra un viottolino in leggera salita evitare quello pianeggiante che entra nel bosco che in prossimita del tornante stradale incrocia il tracciato dellacquedotto costituito da piastre in cemento seguire ora lacquedotto verso destra praticamente in piano superando anche un ponticello metallico piu oltre si incontra un passaggio caratteristico in cui la sporgenza della roccia crea una specie di tunnel vedi foto aggirabile su passerella metallica attenzione a prendere la deviazione a sinistra appena superato questo tratto il sentiero prosegue ora in salita superando due vasche abbeveratoio in cemento qui e possibile riempire la borraccia il sentiero ben marcato conduce infine alla meta da quando si e lasciata lauto e trascorsa almeno unora essendo il luogo abbastanza frequentato la cache e stata posizionata poco oltre le cascatelle ad una quindicina di metri circa dalle rocce in direzione di una radura con segni di bivacco la cache e un contenitore di plastica che contiene logbook e penna certificato ftf gc winnythepooh squalo en grotta allonda is located about 700 meters high at the foot of mount matanna the cave long and narrow is placed at the base of a large rock from the top of which fall down streams and waterfalls that make the place really beautiful the cave is currently being studied because prehistoric remains including human bones have been found inside the place is charming for the landscape as well as for the acoustics in some points there is a clear echo phenomenon additionally during very cold winters some small waterfalls freeze and water mist that settles on the grass and trees is transformed into a layer of glass making the atmosphere truly enchanted besides the main cave there are other smaller ones along the wall on which there are also some short clinbing routes to reach grotta allonda you have to go to trescolli a village of casoli go on after the village till you meet a denial of access park here and go on walking but you can also leave the car ahead after the prohibition on one of the many places on the sides of the road just before a bar at the right of a square take a track uphill avoid the plain track leading into the woods that near a sharp turn crosses the path of the aqueduct made of concrete plates now follow the aqueduct to the right practically flat passing a metal bridge more over there is a characteristic passage where the ledge of the rock creates a sort of tunnel see picture circumvented by a metal walkway be careful to take the left fork just after this stretch the trail continues now uphill past two drinking concrete tanks here you can fill the bottle the wellmarked path eventually leads to the goal since you parked the car its about an hour since the place is frequented enough the cache was located just beyond the waterfall about fifteen meters from the rocks in the direction of a clearing with signs of bivouac the cache is a plastic bag that contains logbook pen ftf certificate gc winnythepooh little shark
claudyp bemi62 iop

slo obmocje begunj je bogato z arheoloskimi najdbami do njih pelje urejena lambergova pot imenovana po vitezu gasperju lambergu ki je zivel na gradu kamen obiskovalca vodi pot od gradu kamen iz 12 stoletja jame zijalke iz casa mlajse kamene dobe hudicevega gradica prvic omenjen leta 1185 in arheoloskih najdbisc njivice s sledovi iz starejse bronaste dobe do starejse zelezne dobe vec izveste na kraju samem iz informativnih tabel v treh jezikih dostop do hudicevega gradica je neurejen in zahteven brez ustreznega plezalnega znanja in opreme obisk odsvetujemo eng begunje area is rich in archaeological finds regulated lamberg route leads to them route is named after the knight gasper lamberg who has lived in castle rock visitor trail leads from the castle rock from the 12 century the cave zijalka from neolithic time the devils small chateau first mentioned in 1185 and archaeological sites njivice traces of older bronze age to the iron age find out more on the spot from the information boards in three languages access to the devils small chateau is messy and difficult without proper climbing skills and equipment isnt advised to visit

bifurcation 4 voluntary post a photo of you andor your gps in your log take picture in front divecave or outflowcave jaskyna diablova diera v strednej casti braniska 300 m pod sutokom velkej svinky a dolneho potoka a 500 m nad sedlom branisko v nadmorskej vyske 748 m sa vdaka mechanickej erozii vyvinul pozoruhodny krasovy fenomen sustava ponornej a vyverovej jaskyne diablova diera vyver nazyvany bystrik je na druhej strane hrebena vo vyske 720 m vchod do jaskyne predstavuje vyrazny previs a nachadza sa asi 20 m od vybudovanej hradze hydrologickeho merneho profilu previsovy vchod je malych rozmerov a prechadza dvomi prudkymi a uzkymi perejami za perejami vedie oblukova chodba asi 120 m chodba je spociatku 10 m siroka je nizka a mierne klesa neskor sa rozsiruje prudsie klesa a vytvara pomerne velku salu na konci potok mizne v sifone v sale su pozoruhodne strkovopieskove naplavy ktore neustale menia rozmery a tvar a to v priamej suvislosti s castymi privalovymi dazdami poslednych rokov vody sa neskor objavuju na druhej strane hrebena vo vyvierackach hlavna vyvieracka je pomerne nizka a uzka vody vytekajuce z vyvieracky vytvaraju diablov potok severne nad hlavnym vyverom sa nachadza jeden mensi a jeden uplne maly vyver bifurkacia velkej svinky v priestore pred diablovou dierou dochadza k bifurgacii velkej svinky znamena to ze cast vod odbocuje na zapad aby sa stratila v markantnom ponore a cast vod pokracuje svojim korytom juznym a neskor juhovychodnym smerom v tomto pripade lava vetva z pohladu nad rozdvojenim ako potok a neskor riecka svinka tecie z nasho udolia popod sedlo branisko odvodnuje vychodnu cast jeho svahov potom sa staca kluckuje sarisskou vrchovinou ciernou horou a nasledne sa vlieva do hornadu prava vetva sa po par metroch straca v ponore diablovej diery a tecie krizom cez hreben pohoria v dolomitovom podlozi na zapadnej strane vyviera v niekolkych miestach steka ako potok diablov potok do polanoviec tu sa vlieva do potoka branisko ktory sa po sutoku so zehricou a margeciankou vlieva do hornadu voda z jedneho pramena sa teda dostane do tejto rieky dvomi cestami paradoxne je ze odklonena cast vody z diablovej diery ovela skor nez hlavny tok velkej svinky k bifurkacii dochadza ked vodny tok ktory tecie v jednom prude sa rozdeli do dvoch alebo viacerych samostatnych prudov ktore pokracuju samostatne niektore rieky tvoria komplex sieti jednotlivych prudov a to najma v deltach ak sa prudy nakoniec opat zlucia potom bifurkacia vytvori ostrov cave devils hole in the middle of a mountain branisko 300 m below the confluence of the creek velka svinka great piggies and dolny potok lower creek and 500 m above the saddleback branisko at an altitude of 748 m is due to mechanical erosion of the karst has developed a remarkable phenomenon a system of divecave and outflowcave diablova diera devils hole outflow called bystrik is on the other side of the ridge at an altitude of 720m the entrance is a significant overhang and is located about 20 m from the dam which was constructed as hydrological measuring profile overhang entrance is small size and passes through two narrow and steep rapids behind the rapids there is arc corridor of about 120 m corridor is initially 10 m wide is low and slightly declining later extended sharply falls and creates a relatively large room at the end the stream disappears in the siphon in the hall there is remarkable pebblesand sediments which are constantly changing size and shape depending on frequent torrential rains last years water is then appearing on the other side of the ridge in a few outflows main outflow is relatively low and narrow and creates new creek diablov potok devils creek north of the main outflow is a smaller and a little outflow bifurcation of creek velka svinka in the area of devils hole there is bifurcation of creek velka svinka this means that part of the water turns to the west and disappears in the striking dive and part of water continues south and then southeasterly direction in this case the left stream from the viewpoint of the bifurcation is flowing as river svinka from saddleback branisko drains the eastern part of the slope then flows trough saris highlands mountain chain cierna hora and flows into the river hornad right stream is losing in the cave diablova diera after a few meters and flows across the mountain ridge in the dolomite bedrock on the west side of mountain the springs in several places as the diablov potok flows down to village polanovce here it flows into a creek branisko which is the confluence with zehrica and margecianka eventually water is flows into the river hornad water from a single stream thus gets into the same river in two ways a paradox is that deviated part of the water from the diablova diera reaches river hornad much sooner than the main stream of svinka river bifurcation occurs when a river flowing in a single stream separates into two or more separate streams which continue downstream some rivers form complex networks of distributaries especially in their deltas if the streams eventually merge again then the bifurcation forms an island

slo turska jama ki jo omenja ze jv valvasor se nahaja pod vrhom hriba gojzdasnica 864mnv na njegovi severozahodni strani gre za tezje dostopno vecjo skalno votlino ki je naravno zavarovana ima dvodelno odprtino zaprto s kamnitim zidom zgornja vecja odprtina je bila nekoc zaprta z zeleznimi kovanimi duri utrdba je nastala v casu 15 16 stoletja in je sluzila kot varno zatocisce predvsem za otroke zenske in starce v casu turskih vpadov vrnimo se v sedanjost in se povzpnimo se na skalni pomol nad jamo od tu si lahko privoscimo pogled na levi breg save kjer prehaja dolina v dezelo in naprej prav do ocaka triglava za dostop do jame predvsem zaradi zadnjega kratkega a strmega vzpona priporocam suho vreme na druzinskem izletu je primerno otroke zavarovati pred zdrsom eng turkish cave which already mentioned jv valvasor is located near the top of the hill gojzdaanica 864mnv on its north side larger rock cavity which is naturally hedged is difficult to access it has a twopart opening closed by a stone wall the upper opening is bigger and was once closed with the door of forged iron the fort was built in the 15th 16 century and has served primarily as a safe place for children women and old men at the time of turkish invasions let us return to the present and climb the rocky pier over the cave from here you can have a look at the left bank of the sava river which crosses the valley in the land and continue right up to the mountain of triglav to access the cave mainly due to last a short but steep ascent recommend dry weather on a family trip it is appropriate to protect children from slipping

koordinate vas bodo pripeljale do vhoda v jamo zaklad je skrit cisto na koncu jame dobrih 5 minut v notranjost za obisk je potrebna svetilka sigurno pa boste tudi umazani do zaklada se pozimi verjetno ne bo dalo priti odvisno od kolicine snega saj vcasih sneg zasuje dostop v jamo od tod tudi ime dostop v jamo je strm in drsec zato previdnost ne bo odvec na poti do zaklada boste naleteli na dve naravni pregradi kjer utegnete visokorasli iskalci imeti manjse tezave za obisk zaklada nujno potrebujete svetilko dobre cevlje in oblacila ki se lahko umazejo eng coordinates will lead you to the entrance of the cave treasure is hidden in the very end of the cave 5 minutes inside to visit the cache flashlight is needed sure youll also dirty in the the winter may not be possible to get the cache depending on the amount of snow snow sometimes swamped access to the cave access to the cave is steep and slippery so caution may be necessary on the way to the treasure you will encounter two natural barrier where tall persons may have some minor problems to visit the cache you need flashlight good shoes and clothes that can get dirty

the village of szentgal this place has been habited since the stone age because of its secure location in the mountain legend has it that it is named after a priest from saint gallen he traveled the land on the orders of duke geza to convert the hungarian population to christianity the village is first mentioned in a document dating back to 1281 the residents were thu hunters of the king flint mountain cave the cave is located about 650 yards westnorthwest of the village of szentgal its two entrances are found in an abandoned part of the quarry these entrances are being slowly filled up with the fallen stones the southern gate is about 15yards by 15 yards the 2yard wide northern entrance is low and it can be accessed by sliding through it the entrances are at about 400 yards elevation level the cave is about 90 yards long in total the largest hollow is about 210 sqm fourteen protected bats species inhabit the cave they also use it as a temporary shelter this is the only proven place of occurrence of the northern bat in the country the entrance to the cave is blocked by metal bars due to the falling rocks inside and the bats should not be disturbed either building fire in front of the cave is prohibited the cache n 47deg 82590 e 17deg 419690 408 m there is a white capsule under a moss cover rock near the lower right corner of the entrance please hide the capsule carefully after finding it the village can be reached on road 8 from veszprem turn south at herend you can park at the railway station n 47deg 81760 e 17deg 424630 385 m you should walk from here towards the cave after finding the cache you can take the red marked path back to your car the total distance is about 13 miles elevation difference 67 yards translationid=12082 thank you

italiano descrizone grotta la palombara le coste delle puglia sono 80 calcarea e pietra dolomia insieme formano una combiazione ripida e di calce molte dura come la roccia dolomitiea si ceome la roccia dolmitiea a molto dura durissima quindi non sono portate a erusioni la grotta la palombara e al livello del mare essa e ststa portata su da una eruzione lo scoglio dolomitico e stato sollevato dalle acque milioni di anni fa cosi ha piu entrate il dentro delle grotte e tipico del calcare delle puglia le demensioni della grotte all interno sono enormi l incresso delle grotte sono visibile dalla terra e si entra tramite una barca la bellezza di queste grotte e l enorma profendita interna diario di bordo calcolare l altzza argezza della grotte una lampada visitare queste grotte abbiamo bisogno di una corda x la profondita l elometro che molte barche l anno eotie equipagiameto quarda la struttura delle grotta quandro entri e poi scrivere un messaggio sul mio profilo english describtion the coast of apulia consists of limestone and dolomite the percentage proportion of these rock types is 80 the combination of both types is very interesting strong eroded limestone is surrounded by dolomite dolomite is a very tough type of rock and the erosion has only a little effect on dolomite the cave is located at sea level and so it is exposed to erosion the limestone was washed and formed out the dolomite cliffs and there build a small entrance to the cave inside the cave you will see a changing of the composition of the typical italian minerals the erosion inside the cave is gigantic you can see the entrance to the cave only from the sea and you can reach it only with boat the size of the cave is an absolute specificity unique and an exceptional item to log this earthcache measure the depth of the water use for this a cord or a sounder estimate the height and width of the cave use a flashlight for this please compare and describe the rock at the entrance and inside the cave please send me this description with email together via contact from profil with the results of your measure

italiano la grotta del leone si trova lungo la strada che costeggia il monte pisano tra asciano ed agnano sul lato est il pavimento scende fino a raggiungere il livello delle acque di un piccolo laghetto sotterraneo al centro della stanza si trova un enorme masso la cui forma somigliante ad un leone ha suggerito il nome dato alla grotta sul lato nord unapertura conduce ad una seconda camera interna raggiungibile anche salendo dal lato ovest e calandosi per un piccolo passaggio fu scavata negli anni 50 da e tongiorgi vi furono rinvenuti resti di industrie litiche del paleolitico superiore ma piu importante e la frequentazione durante il neolitico con importanti testimonianze di culti in particolare furono identificati culti agrari attestati da un focolare con grano e da circoli di pietre con ossa umane forse vi furono anche culti delle acque collegabili alla presenza del laghetto vennero rinvenuti anche resti di sepolture delleta del rame con armi in metallo e selce e ornamenti su osso e conchiglia la grotta e facilmente accessibile lasciate lauto poco dopo il cimitero o subito dopo la curva vedi mappa e proseguite fino al waypoint1 qui entrate nel sottobosco e dirigetevi verso il palo della luce visibile nella foto 4 lingresso della grotta e proprio davanti a voi la cache e un contenitore locknlock e nascosta allesterno della grotta noi naturalmente consigliamo di portare una torcia ed entrare a visitarla si puo fare in tutta sicurezza e senza sporcarsi contenuto originale della cache logbook e penna certificato ftf bustine figurine geocoin conchiglia pallina di gomma pallina per gatti english the lion cave is situated on the road that skirts the pisan mountain between asciano and agnano the floor comes down on the east side until it reaches the level of a little underground lake in the middle of the cave there is a big rock which looks like a lion thats the reason why the cave got its particular name on the north side there is an entrance to a second chamber that can be reached to a second way going upstairs to the west side and down in a little passage in the cave there was found rests of paleolithic and neolithic like circles of stones with human bones and rests of the copper era metal and stone weapons and ornaments made by bones and shells the cave can be easily reached you can park the car after the cemetery or immediately after the turn of the street see map walk to waypoint1 and then enter in the bushes you can see a light pole see photo 4 the entrance of the cave is just after it the cache is a locknloch container it is hidden outside the cave but for us the best thing is to bring a torch and enter to visit you can make it without problems original contents of the cache logbook and pen ftf certificate geocoin shell pallina di gomma little gum ball ball for cats

railways company under the designation nr v was one of the most important kladno mines it was named after the first general director of state railways company wilhelm engerth he was significant professor of technical university in graz the pit was cut in 1868 in a rectangular profile 6635x222 m with three sections southern ventilation central extraction and northern climbing and water conduit section at a depth of 386 m was uncovered coal vein thickness of about 948 m the first floor was excavated at a depth of 39058 m and the hole was deepened later on the second floor at a depth of 42565 m digging was completed in 1872 and coal mining began in april 1873 mine was connected with the mine bresson and falls down the hall on the 4th floor barre mine the wooden tower was 123 m high to the center sheave which had diameter 38m and had a slot for a flat cable mining cages were double storey steam extraction machine quiball belgian production was in operation from 18701922 later replaced by electric one the original wooden coal sorter built in 1875 was replaced by a new in 1890 with a capacity of 200000 tons of coal annually in 1895 coal washery was built by wunderlich turbojet system the coal was loaded on the wagons of the train at the kladno ostrovec station due to dwindling mining at the mine bresson and utilization of local sorter was built in 1902 the surface lift to transport coal from the bresson to treatment plant at engerth byvala hornicka kolonie 80 leta minuleho stoleti the former mining colony 80s of last century together with mine mine bresson engerth belonged to the most fervent mines mine was accompanied by a constant mash there were also negative pressure conditions when passability of the tracks in the mine had to maintenance more than a hundred pairs of miners drevic in 1918 the mine passed into the possession of black coal mines in kladno and later to property of the prague iron company after 1936 mining was transferred from barre to the mine pit ronna in hnidousy mine lasted until the end of the second world war and in 1946 was backfilled the final security maintenance was made in 1999 according to available data there were mined in 1936 7 062 677 tons of coal mine was the second longest serving in kladno land registry mining building was reduced to two upper floors and was maintained until today for the last time des fouilles ont revele des silex des harpons un propulseur des sagaies en bois de cervides datant de 15 000 a 8 000 ans avant notre ere on y a decouvert de nombreux restes descargots qui etaient utilises comme reserve alimentairecette grotte est maintenant vide et peut etre exploree frontale indispensable casque conseille elle est cependant assez petite et il nexiste pas de risque de se perdre il est possible dentrer par lentree principale et de sortir par lautre entree the explotration gave silex harpoons assegai made of elk woods dated 15000 y to 8000y bc some snails were also found that were the base of the food this cave is now empty and can be visited you need a light and a helmet is also recomanded it is small enough and you cannot get lost you can go inside in the main entrance and get out at the secondary one

vor 70 jahren hatte der damalige pfarrer emil basler die idee oberhalb des dorfkerns auf dem rabacherli eine lourdesgrotte erstehen zu lassen manner und jungmanner von eiken machten sich tatkraftig ans werk sie holten mit pferdefuhrwerken in der chinzhalde die kalkfelsen und unter fachkundiger leitung eines maurermeisters wurde die grotte errichtet wie sie heute noch zu sehen ist am 18 mai 1939 wurde die grotte vom damaligen dekan schmid feierlich eingeweiht trotzdem nehmen immer wieder viele menschen den steilen beim friedhof beginnenden kreuzweg mit den 14 stationen unter die fusse wer alle stationen sehen mochte sollte bei der kirche parkieren an der strasse sind nur beschrankt parkmoglichkeiten der cache ist etwas von der grotte entfernt und ist vom weg her erreichbar ihr musst nicht beim felsen oder den banken suchen geniesse die ruhe und die schone aussicht bitte stift mitbringen

free counters francais en france la plupart des regions ont connu une activite miniere presque toutes sont aujourdhui fermees mais la memoire demeure et le tourisme minier se developpe notamment en region provencealpescote dazur le sudest de la france comprend une grande diversite danciennes mines dans des paysages spendides les filons metalliques plomb zinc fluorite les petites mines de cuivre de cap garonne au pradet et de leouve et la mine de plomb argentifere de largentierelabessee sont des sites dinteret historique et touristique remarquable le bassin de lignite de provence les bassins de bauxite du centre var et des baux ou fut identifie la bauxite sont egalement des gisements de savoirfaire cap garonne se trouve a une douzaine de kilometres au sudest de toulon il est constitue dune masse de pelites et gres rouges du permien interstratifies avec des basaltes egalement permiens et surmontee en concordance par du trias inferieur permien et trias inferieur sont constitues de roches detritiques continentales dorigine fluviatile gres pelites conglomerats lensemble est chevauche par le paleozoique legerement metamorphique du socle provencal dit socle des maures cap siciesource pierre thomas laboratoire de sciences de la terre ens de lyon english most regions of france have experienced significant mining activity at some point in the past today nearly all mining operations have ended but the memory remains and mining heritage tourism is now developing it is particularly important in the provencealpescote dazur region a large number of old mines set in splendid landscapes can be found in the south of france these include metallic ore mines for lead zinc and fluorspar and small copper mines in the region of cap garonne at le pradet at largentierelabesse is an old lead and silver mine which is also of historical interest and attracts tourists the lignite basin of provence and bauxite basins of central var and around les baux where aluminium was invented have become centres of mining expertise cap garonne is 12 km far from toulon southeast its a mass of pelite and permian red sandstones interstratified with also permian basalts and surmounted in agreement by lower triassic permian and lower triassic consist of continental detrital rocks of origin fluviatile sandstone pelites conglomerates the unit is overlapped by paleozoic slightly metamorphic base of provence known as base of the maurescape sicie source pierre thomas laboratory of earth sciences ens of lyon pour valider cette cache il vous faudra repondre aux questions
