je vous propose de decouvrir un pan souvent meconnu ou oublie de lhistoire de la vendee celle de lextraction miniere duranium vous ne craignez absolument rien sur ce site qui netait quun site dextraction de la pechblende oxyde duranium la concentration pour obtenir le fameux yellow cake ou gateau jaune se faisait a getigne loireatlantique cette mine duranium dont lextraction sest faite uniquement a ciel ouvert est situee immediatement a lest de la commune de mortagnesursevre elle fait partie avec le site dexploitation de le retail de la concession devrunes lextraction duranium sy est faite entre 1957 et 1960 puis en 1986 ce qui permit den extraire environ 47 tonnes contexte historique apres la seconde guerre mondiale le gouvernement francais se lance dans la recherche de gisements duranium notamment dans les terrains hercyniens du massif armoricain du massif central et des vosges cest en 1950 que le gouvernement francais debute la prospection de luranium dans le massif armoricain la division miniere de vendee est fonde par le commissariat a lenergie atomique cea a mortagnesursevre en 1954 qui deviendra cogema puis areva suite a la decouverte de gisements duranium dans la zone granitique qui setend de clisson loireatlantique a parthenay deuxsevres les resultats etant prometteurs la division miniere de vendee est creee en 1954 elle sinstalle sur le site de fleuriais a mortagnesursevre a lemplacement dune ancienne usine textile sous son administration de nombreuses mines sont ouvertes en deuxsevres vendee loireatlantique et maineetloire les travaux seffectuent en mines souterraines et a ciel ouvert a la limite de la vendee et des deuxsevres la commanderie sera le second gisement de la division par limportance de sa production pres de 4000 tonnes duranium les autres sites du departement de vendee peu productifs nauront quune courte periode dactivite luranium vendeen a employe jusqua cinq cents mineurs repartis sur quatre departements il a permis de produire lequivalent de deux ans de la consommation francaise delectricite des annees 1990 interet geologique les prospections effectuees a partir des annees 1951 ont montre que lessentiel des mineralisations uraniferes se trouvaient au pourtour du massif granitique hercynien de mortagnesursevre au contact tectonique souvent mylonitique entre ce dernier et les metamorphites qui lentourent migmatites amphibolites seule la mine de la commanderie se situe a linterieur du massif le long dune faille recoupant les accidents bordiers dans les gisements de la region des herbiers les mineralisations uraniferes sont restreintes aux gneiss migmatitiques qui sont au sud du contact avec le granite ou enclaves a linterieur de celuici bien que spectaculaires en surface pechblende massive avec gummi tes les mineralisations se sont averees trop ponctuelles pour permettre une exploitation importante

the calanque de sugiton is one of the numerous calanques located between marseille and cassis while quite small sugiton is perhaps the most known of all marseille calanques simply because it can be easily accessed by hikers starting from luminy university campus and because it is open to tourists even during hot season unlike most calanques in fact during summer most of the calanques are closed because of high fire risk a small beach can be found at the extremity of the calanque la calanque de sugiton est situee au sud de lagglomeration marseillaise pres du site universitaire de luminy alors que la toute proche calanque de morgiou se situe dans le quartier des baumettes la calanque de sugiton fait partie du quartier du redon1 elle est generalement frequentee par des nudistes qui sinstallent sur une petite plage de galets ou sur des dalles de rocher a une dizaine de metres du rivage emerge un ilot rocheux caracteristique portant le nom de rocher du torpilleur en raison de sa ressemblance avec un navire de guerre il est parfois appele le cygne son aspect evoquant cet oiseau voguant a la surface des flots

si do leta 1963 so se v opusceni gramozni jami v tako imenovani dupliski jami okoliski fantje kopali in lovili zabe potem je v to idilo vdrla civilizacija kotanjo so mozje v smetarskih uniformah zaceli zasipavati z odpadki do leta 1993 je bila jama zapolnjena nad njo pa je nastal se 120 m dolg okoli 80100 m sirok in 7 m visok kup odpadkov dupliska jama se je spremenila v dupliski hrib zaradi neznosnega smradu in pohabljenega razgleda na kamniske planine so odlagalisce zaprli velikanski kup so izravnali in oblikovali v hrib ter ga opremili z oddusnimi cevmi celotno povrsino so prekrili z 10 cm debelo plastjo rodovitne zemlje na mejah novega hriba pa so nasadili nekaj dreves leta 1999 so krajani ponovno izpostavili problem neurejenosti in zapuscenosti deponije ter brezbriznosti do kraja kamor ponoci zahajajo skrivnostnezi ki odmetavajo odpadke cez dan pa se prav tam igrajo otroci ne da bi vedeli ali so tla deponije onesnazena s strupi ali tezkimi kovinami vascani so podali pobudo da se dogajanja v tleh razisce projekt je prerasel samega sebe obcinski svetniki so odlocili naj se na pobudo krajevne skupnosti duplica neurejena deponija dodatno prekrije s plastjo rodovitne zemlje in se s posaditvijo gozdnih dreves spremeni v gozdni park ta park bi v svoji rasti ustvaril prijaznejse okolje nenazadnje pa tudi prostor za sprehode rekreacijo ter pocitek predlozen je bil nacrt za ureditev gozdnega parka najbolj priljubljenih slovenskih drevesnih vrst z drevesno gozdno ucno potjo v obliki osmice na platoju deponije skupaj je bilo posajenih okoli 1200 sadik kasneje je bilo tu prepoznanih 76 vrst nocnih in 9 vrst dnevnih metuljev 15 vrst ptic 7 vrst netopirjev in 6 vrst vecjih sesalcev zanimivo pa je to da prebivalci duplice hrib se vedno imenujejo dupliska jama prvotna vsebina zaklada nagrada za ftf neaktiviran geocoin logbook + svincnik + silcek nekaj stvari za menjavo opozorilo ob lepem vremenu je tukaj lahko dosti ljudi takrat bodite neopazni en local boys were swimming and catching frogs in abandoned gravel pit called duplica pit until 1963 when garbage men began with waste dumping in 1993 the pit was fully filled and 120 m long 80100 m wide and 7 m high hill was created above duplica pit became duplica hill due to unbearable smell and ruined view of kamnik alps the disposal area was closed large hill was flatten and shaped in hill then it was equipped with vent pipes the whole area was covered with 10 cm thick layer of soil and few trees were planted around in 1999 the locals exposed the problem of abandonment and mess again as a result of mysterious people dumping the trash during the night and at exactly the same spot the children were playing during the day without knowing whether the landfill soil is contaminated with toxins the villagers took the initiative to investigate what is happening with the soil therefore the municipal councilors determined to additionally cover the place with another layer of fertile soil and with planting the trees turn it into forest park this park would be created in its growthfriendly environment as well as place for walking recreation and rest the design for the forest park containing most popular slovenian tree species with forest educational trail in the form of a figure eight was made about 1200 seedlings were planted later on 76 species of nocturnal 9 species of butterflies 15 species of birds 7 species of bats and 6 species of larger mammals were identified in the park interesting fact is that locals still call this hill duplica pit original content of cache ftf award jakoba drugi rudarji gredo poplaknit grlo v eno izmed stevilnih idrijskih gostiln migavck pa ima druge nacrte caka na mrak nato se napoti v hrib nad idrijo v smeri proti cekovniku pot ubira po skrivni stezi skozi predel gostega gozda ki ga imenujejo rupa v nahrbtnik je nalozil bogato cinabaritno rudo ki jo je skrivaj odnesel iz rudniske separacije kruh slanino in pijaco rudarjev pelinov gerus danes bo dovolj rude za eno rundo v strmini sredi gozda s svetilko posveti na polkrozen ploscat kamen jo ugasi poslusa in pogleduje ali mu ni kdo sledil nato migavckova jama leta 1987 in leta 2017 danes do brezna ni tezko priti saj se lahko skoraj v neposredno blizino jame pripeljemo z avtom lestve proti povraju slikano leta 1987 z naravnim kamnom v katerega je vdelal mocne kovinske tecaje in jih povezal z mehanizmom za odpiranje je migavck popolnoma skril vhod v prepovedano zgalnico svoj nocni siht je opravljal v 30 letih prejsnjega stoletja ko sta bila idrija in rudnik pod italijani rudnik je zaradi brezbriznega odnosa italijanske drzave in gospodarske krize posloval zelo slabo place rudarjev so bile nizke zato je migavck na skrivaj odnasal rudo jo topil ter zivo srebro tihotapil v jugoslavijo in trst ker je vedno imel denar je postal sumljiv nekega jutra sta ga v gozdu s pivsko steklenico polno zivega srebra zalotila kapetan gozdne milice in gozdar prijavila sta ga in migavcka so se isti dan zgrabili po zaslisanju so ga karabinjerji odpeljali v gozd da bi jim pokazal kje ima topilnico pred vhodom v jamo jih je preprical da so mu sneli verige ces da vklenjen kamna ne more odvaliti ko so ga osvobodili je karabinjerja vrgel vsakega na eno stran in pobegnil nekaj dni se je skrival v tezko dostopni ravbarski jami nedalec od topilnice potem pa je pobegnil v jugoslavijo in se nato naselil v bosni tu se pripoved o janezu jurjavcicu migavcku konca vhod v migavckovo jamo slikano leta 1987 nekaj tehnicnih podatkov o tej preprosti a ucinkoviti napravi za pridobivanje zivega srebra zganje nakradene rujde se je vrsilo v predelani plocevinasti posodi od karbida taka pecica je imela spodaj majhen prostor za vodo in odprtino za reguliranje vleka nad posodo je bil speljan dimovod cev oblozena z mokrimi krpami ali navlazenih mahim proces enkratnega zganja priblizno 70 kg rude je trajal okoli 50 ur izplen je bil tudi po 45 pridobljena kolicina zivega srebra pa od 18 do 25 kg pridobljeno zivo srebro je bilo toceno v prazne steklenice za piva ena steklenica je vsebovala 65 kg zivega srebra prodajna cena je bila 6 lir za kg hg ta cena se je nato povzpela tudi na 10 lir na kilogram ce upostevamo da je rudniski delavec v letu 193738 mesecno zasluzil okoli 380 lir je jasno da je bilo tihotapstvo zivega srebra dokaj donosen posel ostanki peci v topilnici na dnu jame iii podstropju slikano leta 1987 topilnica je velika okoli sest kvadratnih metrov v njej so priprave za zganje rude tu stoji ovalna zelezna pec z debelimi stenami obdana z dodatnim kovinskim plascem iz nje pa vodi zelezen dimnik v tleh pod lestvijo so ostanki stirikotne lesene cevi migavck je iz jame odvajal dim in dovajal zrak ob dimniku poteka zelezna vrv s katero je jurjavcic s sistemom loput uravnaval dovod zraka izhod dimnika pa je v skalah okoli dva metra od vhoda v jamo ker se pri zganju cinobrove rude sproscajo strupene zivosrebrove pare ni popolnoma jasno ali je bil ob zganju migavck speleometriccave map not a trading object leave it there 3 keychains badge inside the cache container there is also a speleometric map of the migauck cave which is not intended as a trading object leave it there for everyone to see janez jurjavcic or migauck ponounced meegauchk as other miners called him was a miner in the time before the second world war when the entire western territory of slovenia was besieged by the fascist italy because of the economic crisis and disregard of the italian government the mine was deep in the red and the wages were miserable that is why migauck secretly took the ore from the mine and while his colleagues were drinking in one of the many joints of the mining town he was on his way to the smelting furnace he set up in a cave deep in the dense forest near idrija he then smuggled the extracted mercury to trst and yugoslavia unlike the other miners he rarely found himself without money and thus became suspicious he was caught in the forest one day with a bottle full of mercury by a lumberjack and the captain of the forest militia and was arrested later that same day after hearing two italian policemen carabineri took him to show them where his furnace was when they arrived migauck persuaded his guards to unshackle him as he could not open the cave entrance with handcuffs on they complied and once free migauck shoved the two guards to one side each and ran away he hid for a few days in another cave nearby then crossed the border into yugoslavia and settled in bosnia the cave is about 6 sqr meters at the bottom which is some 8 meters down from the entrance the smelting furnace ladders and parts of the chimney are still present in the cave today the entrance was blocked by a large stone propped up on two large metal hinges because the burning o mercury ore releases poisonous fumes it is speculated migauck was not inside the cave when the ore was burning but rather just lit the fire and returned the next day to collect the mercury source slovene <url>

erinnerungen an koch mine zu ihrem 100 todestag 13 november 1998 wer war koch mine sie lebte im 19 jahrhundert wurde als bauerntocher am 10 april 1837 geboren ihr richtiger name war wilhelmine koch doch von allen wurde sie nur mine genannt sie blieb ihr leben lang unverheiratet weit uber die grenzen unserer gemeinde und nachbargemeinden hinaus war sie bekannt noch heute ist koch mine fur die alten aber auch die jungen leute ein begriff mine hatte sich mit ihrem vater zerstritten verliess ihn und zog in einen kleinen busch nahe gelegen von dalena in richtung golbitz unweit von dornitz zusammen mit ihrem lebensgefahrten dem schuhmacher karl hahn bewohnte sie dort eine alte hutte die hutte stammte noch von der silberwasche her die sich vormals in diesem busch befand ihre lage beschrieb man fruher wie folgt die hutte ist leicht zu finden man geht von dalena den weg nach golbitzkonnern kaum 1000 schritt vom dorfe sind wir in einer mulde die der huttenbach sixtbach durchfliesst und dort befindet sie sich mine war eine grosse tierliebhaberin sie hatte viele tiere wie hunde katzen ziegen schweine und andere zwei ziegenbocke mit grossen hornern durften wohl ihre lieblinge gewesen sein mit all diesen tieren teilte sie ihre behausung sie lebten alle zusammen in der hutte mine schlachtete keines ihrer tiere von daher wurden sie immer mehr und sie wurden alter und alter wann sich ihr lebensgefahrte der hahnekarl karl hahnder sie beschutzt und unterstutzt hat zu ihr gesellte ist leider nicht bekannt zwischen beiden soll eine strenge stubenordnung geherrscht haben er trug ebenfalls zum broterwerb bei machte schippenstiele die er nach domnitz zum gutsbesitzer gneist brachte der sie ihm gegen naturalien oder manchmal auch geld abnahm zum einkaufen ging mine mit einem grossen tragekorbwie es damals ublich war nach dornitz ihre wasche wurde im vorbeifliessenden bach gewaschen sonntags kamen oft die kinder aus konnern und umgebung zu koch mine und besuchten sie diese freute sich sehr und hatte immer fur jeden etwas wie eine tasse milch honig oder einige beeren allerdings blieb es auch nicht aus dass einige grossere kinder des ofteren vor ihre hutte zogen um mine zu argern als couragierte person aber hatte sie keine angst und vertrieb die storenfriede mit einem stock alle leute in der gesamten region kannten koch mine gut niemand hatte etwas schlechtes mit ihr im sinn doch wie es im leben so ist wird einem schnell etwas angedichtet so wollten einige wissen dass mine eine reiche bauerntochter war die viel geld gehabt hatte und es noch besasse und in ihrer hutte vergraben hatte andere wieder erzahlten dass sie die schwarze kunst verstehen wurde und man sollte sich vor ihr huten in wirklichkeit aber konnte die alte frau niemandem etwas zu leide tun doch an die geschichte mit dem geld glaubten manche diese annahme gelangte wohl auch in die hallesche halunkenszene der schmiedegeselle georg schmalz aus halle fuhlte sich dadurch veranlasst am 13 november 1898 in den busch bei dornitz zu kommen und wilhelmine koch meuchlerisch zu ermorden als mine die tur offnete ermordete er sie durch zwei schusse auf der treppe karl hahn wurde funf mal angeschossen er uberlebte der raubmorder suchte nach dem angeblich vielen geld vergebens die gemeinden dalena dornitz und domnitz wurden durch die nachricht des ihrer nahe verubten raubmordes in helle aufregung versetzt der morder konnte jedoch schnell durch die polizei von halle gefunden werden dieser wurde am 6 dezember 1898 vom schwurgericht in halle zum tode verurteilt und am 29 april 1899 im hofe des amtsgerichtes zu halle vom scharfrichter gekopft und direkt am gefangnis vergraben mine koch wurde unter grossem gedrange auf dem dornitzer friedhof bestattet auf dem jetzt alten friedhof kann man auf einer gut erhaltenen grabtafel lesen hier ruht in gott jungfrau wilhelmine koch geb 10 april 1837 gest 13 november 1898 nach der hutte in der koch mine lebte sucht man heute allerdings vergebens die nach dem tode von koch mine unbewohnten und baufalligen gebaude der alten hutte wurden um 1900 abgerissen das grundstuck erwarben die grundbesitzer lampe und finger von dalena ein grossteil der damals vorhandenen baume fielen der axt zum opfer es wurde alles acker auch der erlenbusch der zipfel rechts vom burggraben und sixtbach ist jetzt acker er war 1900 noch 4 morgen gross hiess vordem der rohrteich und war ehemals ein oberer teich des sixtbaches gewesen eine noch heute vorhandene gebuschgruppe von der man sagt hier lebte koch mine wird von vielen nach wie vor kochmin genannt dies waren erinnerungen an koch mine die wohl so manches geheimnis mit ins grab genommen hat das schatzchen liegt an einem bezaubernden flecken der natur irgendwo in kochmin bei n 51deg ac e4 e 011deg 49d b4 der schatz wartet schon im tal der wilhelmine koch auf euch die informationen die ihr benotigt um den mystery zu finden sind in den einzelnen caches der kleinen serie auf koch mines spuren 1 bis 5 enthalten der ort des fragezeichens ist der dornitzer friedhof hier befindet sich das grab der koch mine sonntags an gottesdiensten ist das friedhofstor geoffnet und ihr ruheort kann besichtigt werden unter folgenden link kann jeder selbst nachlesen wann in dieser niedlichen kirche konzerte und noch andere veranstaltungen kostenlos gegeben werden zum pfarrsprengelwettin schaut unter veranstaltungen in der kirche dornitz viel spass beim erkunden und suchen wunscht der domnitzer dieser mystery gehort zu meiner dritten kleinen cacherunde auf koch mines spuren 1 bis 5 mit einer lange von ca 15 km nehmt euch ein wenig zeit und geniesst die umgebung

los bovenstaande puzzel op en gebruik de woordwaarde van het antwoord om het 3 cijferigeslot van de cache te kunnen openen woordwaarde a=1 b=2 c=3 etc voorbeeld cache c=3 a=1 c=3 h=8 e=5 woordwaarde= 20 van de locatie waarbij de cache in de buurt ligt hebben wij ons altijd afgevraagd of het een grot vluchtgang vanaf de kasteel ruine of een schuilkelder is bij navraag bleek dat dit een gang van ongeveer 30 meter lengte is en waar men 20 a 30 jaar geleden heeft geprobeerd om mergel te winnen om onduidelijke redenen is men hiermee gestopt heden ten dagen wordt de grot bewoond door vleermuizen die hier een veilig onderkomen hebben het hekwerk houd mensen tegen maar is zo gemaakt dat vleermuizen in en uit kunnen vliegen vleermuizen de europese vleermuizen zijn veelal insecteneters deze insecten worden in de avondschemer in de lucht gevangen door echolocatie omdat er s winters nauwelijks insecten rondvliegen houden de in nederland en belgie voorkomende soorten een winterslaap waarbij ze hun metabolisme tot een uiterst laag pitje terugdraaien en hun lichaamstemperatuur maar net boven het vriespunt blijft vleermuizen paren voor de winter maar de eisprong en bevruchting treden pas een paar maanden later op meestal is er maar een jong dat wordt gezoogd en blijft tijdens de jacht van de moeder op de slaapplaats hangen vleermuizen kunnen tot tientallen jaren oud worden en planten zich maar langzaam voort ze zijn meestal zeer trouw aan hun standplaats en overwinteringplaats vleermuizen slapen en overwinteren vaak in grote aantallen in grotten of in noordwesteuropa bij gebrek aan grotten in ijskelders bunkers en forten sommige vleermuizen overwinteren ook in boomholten terwijl dwergvleermuizen hoofdzakelijk in huizen in de spouw of op zolder overwinteren in de zomer verkiezen ze plaatsen die warmer zijn dan bunkers en forten en komen ze veelvuldig voor op zolders en kerkzolders ze hangen daar overdag met hun hoofd naar beneden ze kunnen ook ondersteboven in bunkers hangen of aan takken van bomen onder afdakjes enzovoort s avonds vliegen vleermuizen uit ze zijn in de schemering goed te herkennen in de eerste plaats omdat er in de schemering weinig vogels vliegen en in de tweede plaats omdat hun vlucht nogal afwijkend is op jacht naar vliegende insecten hebben ze een zeer onregelmatige vlucht ze kunnen snel hun vliegrichting aanpassen deze vleermuizen zenden namelijk ultrasone geluiden uit die op een prooi weerkaatsen en weer opgevangen worden zo kan de vleermuis de afstand tot zijn prooi en omgeving inschatten en vliegt hij opmerkelijk veilig vleermuizen kunnen in het stikdonker door een kamer vliegen waarin zeer dunne draden gespannen zijn zonder deze te raken omgang met vleermuizen alle belgische en nederlandse vleermuizen zijn beschermde dieren een slapend aangetroffen vleermuis het best rustig laten zitten het zijn nuttige diertjes die enorme hoeveelheden muggen verorberen een vleermuis in winterslaap niet verstoren opwarmen kost hem zoveel energie dat hij de lente weleens niet meer zou kunnen halen als hij vaker wakker wordt dan normaal een zieke of dode vleermuis niet met de handen aanraken sommige vleermuizen zijn met het hondsdolheidvirus besmet in een potje scheppen en als hij nog leeft een vleermuisopvangcentrum waarschuwen een dode vleermuis melden aan een onderzoekscentrum net als een vleermuis in de gordijnen misschien is er wel een vrijwilliger in de buurt die u kan helpen zonder het beest schade te berokkenen sagen sommige mensen vinden vleermuizen angstaanjagend mogelijk gevoed door het feit dat enkele kleine soorten vampiervleermuizen uitsluitend in zuid midden en als dwaalgasten zuidelijk noordamerika van bloed leven worden vleermuizen geassocieerd met vampiers dat klopt echter niet omdat vampiervleermuizen anders dan graaf dracula en zijn soortgenoten hun slachtoffers bijvoorbeeld niet leegdrinken ook drinken geen mensen maar dieren bloed wel kunnen vampiervleermuizen ziekten zoals hondsdolheid overbrengen ook de sage dat vleermuizen per ongeluk in het haar van mensen vast komen te zitten is onjuist hoewel een losse haar voor vleermuizen niet te peilen is is een bos haar en nog belangrijker het hoofd dat daaronder zit met behulp van echolocatie goed te ontwijken

to the cave park infront of the old defunct duino train station walk straight till you get to the bridgeoverpass crossing the traintracks follow the track till you get to see a small house just parallel on the traintracks follow the path till you see a path that goes north you will see a manmade stone wall around the area and look for a path that crosses it head north till you see a large fallen dead tree from here you are on your own no more paths but i suggest follow the stonewallline trust you gps be careful of thorns and sharp stones if you see some patch of pinetrees then you are near the cave some meters infront of the cave is a pile of rocks that came probably inside the cave you will see some pieces of cavestones mineralstones quite different from the typical carso stones important wear good shoes as the stones are sharp long trousers as the area is full of thorns you might get lost and disoriented just follow your gps signal following the hiking path on some maps even from geocaching website is not recommended as the approach from the north is very much dangerous and wild i suggest you approach it from the south inside the cave enter the cave a flashlighttorch is recommended to enter the cave but not necessary around 20meters from the entrance of the cave there is an area with an opening that lets natural light from outside the cache is hidden here see spoiler foto cache is not hidden very high its in a small opening near a small piece of wood cache is behind a small loose stone please put it back the same way you found it warning if you want to explore the rest of the cave be sure to have proper caving equipments enter at your own risk a few meters ahead is a very deep hole

cloubi team34 funainraire sylani alphabet herautais c comme cave caveau ou cellier lalphabet heraultais de a a z est une serie de caches particulieres ouverte a tous ceux qui souhaitent y participer cette serie est basee sur des alphabets deja presents en france mais il faut savoir que cela existait deja dans dautres pays comme la finlande depuis bien longtemps lalphabet heraultais est une serie de cache particuliere le principe de la serie est simple le premier qui a aime lidee de la serie dont cette cache fait partie peut choisir si il le souhaite de poser une nouvelle boite pour poursuivre la serie en respectant si possible les quelques regles suivantes le nom de la cache posee pourra commencer par alphabet heraultais suivi de la lettre de la cache et de comme suivi dun mot ou nom ayant rapport avec lherault les lettres doivent etre utilisee dans lordre alphabetique la cache doit etre posee dans lherault limite du departement pas de limitation de taille difficulte terrain ou type le choix du mot est totalement libre ville specialite monument objet nom dicton etc le descriptif de la cache contiendra les presentes regles et sera suivi dune explication sur le terme choisi pour la cache le principe est simple et ainsi de suite jusqua ce que les 26 lettres soient honorees vous pouvez meme ajouter un bis si vous le souhaiter une bookmark list a aussi ete creee pour cette occasion en voici le lien afin de suivre la serie merci de votre eventuelle participation a la completion de cette serie ludique petite modification pour simplifier un peu les regles les geocacheurs souhaitant participer a la serie peuvent reserver la lettre voulue sur le lien suivant doodle choisissez sur ce site la lettre qui vous tient le plus a coeur les lettres doivent etre posees dans lordre de lalphabet abcd z mais il nest alors pas necessaire de faire ftf sur la cache davant pour poser la suivante il suffit que celleci soit deja publiee pour obtenir le lien vers le code source de lintroduction de la serie alphabet heraultais cliquez ici herault terre viticole la culture de la vigne y a debute au viieme siecle avant jc ce serait les grecs qui implanterent les premiers ceps de vignes en nos terres dapres les dernieres trouvailles archeologiques souvent le vignoble heraultais avant les annees 80 etait assimile a de la piquette vin de tres mauvaise qualite au tres bas taux dalcool suite a leffondrement du marche de ce petit vin les viticulteurs languedociens replanterent des cepages de meilleure qualite et plus au gout actuel tels que le syrah le carignan le grenache le mourvedreetc le resultat est la les ventes ont explosees et nos vins du terroir heraultais se vendent dans le monde entier avec une percee spectaculaire ces derniers temps en chine outre les grands domaines viticoles de nombreux viticulteurs ce sont associes dans des caves cooperatives celliers ou caveaux afin de vendre leur production a un large public celui dassas denomme le cellier du pic regroupe environ 70 viticulteurs du nord montpellierain bonne decouverte cache tube pelloche aimante faites tres attention lors de la saisie de la geocache a la presence de nombreux moldus il en va de la perennite de la geocache bien sur les cooperateurs sont au courant de lemplacement de la cache the culture of the vine began to viith century bc it would be the greeks who implanted the first vines in our land according to the latest archaeological researches often herault vineyard before 80 was similar to the plonk wine of very poor quality very low alcohol content following the collapse of the market for this little wine the languedoc winegrowers replanted the vines better and more modern taste such as syrah carignan grenache mourvedre etc the result is sales exploded and our local wines heraultais sell around the world with a spectacular breakthrough in recent times in china in addition to large wineries many growers are associated in cooperatives cellars or vaults to sell their products to a wider audience that of assas cellier du pic has about 70 growers from north of montpellier have a good discovery cache film canister magnetic be very careful when takinging the container presence of many muggles this is the durability of the geocache of course the cooperators vignerons are aware of the location of the cache forums sites blogs outils en tant que proprietaire de la geocache jassure que le lien facebook mene vers un groupe facebook local actif et utile a la communaute et quil contribue au geocaching de maniere positive ce lien na pas ete verifie par le geocaching hq ou les reviewers

la ligne plm nimes sommieres le vigan serie ii la derniere micheline a quitte la gare de sommieres le 18 janvier 1970 klaxon bloque en guise dadieu le dernier train de marchandise roulera jusquen 1987 depuis 2007 la voie verte suit le trace de la voie de sommieres a caveirac sur 22 kms je vous propose une deuxieme serie de 10 caches qui jalonnent cette voie sur 6 kms depuis la gare de congenies a celle de nages vous pouvez garer votre geomobile sur le parking de chacun des deux villages ainsi qua calvisson cette serie de caches se veut plus recherchee que la precedente bon geocaching a tous

poreba polozona jest w wojewodztwie malopolskim w powiecie myslenickim w gminie myslenice znajduje sie na pogorzu wielickim na granicy z beskidem makowskim w czasach ii wojny swiatowej na terenie okolicznych gor dzialala silna partyzantka ak zgrupowania murawa pod koniec lipca 1944 roku partyzantom udalo sie wyzwolic czesc terenow w tym porebe wydarzenia te upamietnia pomnik postawiony pod kamiennikiem oraz kamienny oltarz na suchej polanie natomiast na lysinie mozna znalezc zbiorowa mogile poleglych partyzantow poreba ma wiele walorow krajobrazowych a o jej atrakcyjnosci swiadczy spory ruch turystyczny znajduje sie tu wiele punktow widokowych z ktorych mozna oglada zarowno beskidy gorce tatry jak i podgorze rozbudowana jest baza turystyczna we wsi znajduje sie osrodek wczasowy pod kamiennikiem oraz kilka osiedli domkow letniskowych na stokach lysiny na granicy z pcimiem znajduje sie schronisko turystyczne na kudlaczach otwarte w 1995 roku spod schroniska rozposciera sie widok na doline raby beskid wyspowy gorce babia gore i tatry przez te tereny przebiega kilka szlakow turystycznych pieszych i rowerowych we wsi zachowaly sie tradycyjne drewniane domy nawet z poczatku xx wieku ciekawe sa rowniez kapliczki przydrozne niektore ponad stuletnie zrodlo wikipedia kamiennik 827 m imponujacy szczyt wznoszacy sie nad lipnikiem i poreba stanowiacy boczne ramie pasma lysiny od glownego grzbietu oddzielony jest gleboka przelecza 709 m z polana sucha rownica masyw kamiennika doskonale widoczny od strony polnocnej porosniety jest piekna buczyna karpacka bardzo stromy stok polnocnowschodni stanowiacy krawedz nasuniecia plaszczowiny magurskiej na slaska nazywany jest pieklem a osuwiskowy stok poludniowozachodni zapadziem nazwa szczytu jest zwiazana z funkcjonujacymi tu niegdys kamieniolomami nad pieklem i w papierni oraz licznymi wychodniami skalnymi budowa geologiczna masywu kamiennika sprzyja powstawaniu osuwisk najwieksze na stoku polnocnym ma postac wielkiej zerwy skalnej ktorej dolna czesc siega zasani nad kolejnym osuwiskiem w rejonie wierzcholka 785 m utworzyla sie rzadka forma podwojnego grzbietu intensywne ruchy osuwiskowe zanotowano w 1934 r na poludniowych stokach kiedy to jezor osuwiska zatamowal ujscie potoku lysina tworzac nieduze jeziorko dzis juz nieistniejace skutkiem osuwiskowych spekan gorotworu sa niewielkie jaskinie o charakterze prostych glebokich szczelin polozone na spietrzeniu grzbietu przy zielonym szlaku jaskinia pod zebem 16 m dlugosci oraz schronisko andrzejkowe 8 m ze wzgledu na pionowe rozwiniecie nie nalezy ich zwiedzac bez odpowiedniego sprzetu i przygotowania trzeci obiekt jaskinowy porebska koleba 3 m dlugosci powstal w sposob sztuczny w wyniku eksploatacji skal w kamieniolomie nad pieklem zrodlo <url> kesz znajduje sie w jednej z tutejszych jaskin aby go znalezc nie trzeba wchodzic gleboko skrytka jest bardzo blisko wejscia jednak koniecznie zabierz ze soba latarke i badz ostrozny podczas swoich poszukiwan do skrytki mozna dojsc zielonym szlakiem prowadzacym z poreby inne kesze nalezace do tej serii to kapliczka w porebie 01 kapliczka w porebie 02 kapliczka w porebie 03 kapliczka przy szlaku kosciol w porebie szlaki w porebie schronisko kudlacze za patriotyzm i ofiary ii wojny swiatowej kamiennik punkt widokowy kamiennik

entre 1638 et 1639 la france declare la guerre a la franchecomte alors sous domination espagnole les habitants du val de morteau apeures se refugierent dans les bois et dans des grottes perdues venez decouvrir lune de ces grottes la grande cave vous pourrez remarquer des trous carres au dessus du porche de la grotte il sagit de logement destines a recevoir des poutres afin de fermer lentree lorsque la grotte etait occuppee afin de proteger du froid et des animaux en chemin pour voir cette grotte vous pourrez admirer le belvedere de vionbillard ce dernier se trouvant juste au dessus de la grotte attention le sentier dacces a la grotte est escarpe et a flanc de falaise faites tres attention aux enfants

kopalnia radoniow nalezala do rejonu ii zakladow przemyslowych r1 zloze ktore nalezalo do najbogatszych w polsce odkryto w 1952 roku przez radzieckich geologow jakos niedlugo pozniej rozpoczeto wydobycie zloze to zwiazane bylo z dwoma rownoleglymi uskokami przecinajacymi kompleks metamorficzny utworzony z gnejsow granitognejsow i lupkow kwarcowoserycytowych w jego obrebie w bezposrednim sasiedztwie uskoku zalegaly trzy pionowe strefy wyklinowujace sie na glebokosci odpowiednio 30 m strefa wschodnia 555 m strefa srodkowa i 300 m strefa zachodnia najbogatsze koncentracje rud uranowych wystepowaly w strefie utleniania siegajacej do glebokosci 270 m mineralizacja uranowa tworzyla tam gniazda w bezposredniej bliskosci uskoku glowna tresc gniazd rudnych stanowily autunit metauranocircyt i torbernit w strefie pierwotnej na glebokosci ponizej 275 m mineralizacja uranowa reprezentowana byla glownie przez smolke uranowa tworzaca cienkie zylki we z fluorycie na poziomie 525 m zaczynala ubozec i na poziomie 670 m calkowicie zanikala kopalnia zakonczyla eksploatacje uranu w 1963 roku pozostal po niej zdegradowany i wylaczony z uzytkowania teren o powierzchni 65 ha na ktorym znajduja sie zasypane szyby oraz inne pozostalosci po infrastrukturze kopalni w kopalni wydobyto w latach funkcjonowania ogolem 342 00431 kg czystego uranu nie wyeksploatowane zasoby wynosza 90 232 kg uranu skrytka znajduje sie na obrzezu terenu kopalni podjecie nie wymaga wejscia na jej teren

vous trouverez sur votre parcours la cache des cacas qui rigolent gc5657a la grotte de la grande cave les habitants du val de morteau se refugierent dans cette grotte lorsque la france declara la guerre a la franchecomte alors sous domination espagnole le long de cette serie qui vous fera emprunter le sentier bleu et jaune ainsi quun partie de la bouce 29 du pays horloger <url> vous pourrez admirer le travail dun artiste sculpteur qui a cree de vertable oeuvres dans les troncs qui jalonnent le chemin la grotte de la grande cave le belvedere du vion billard la chapelle des cernoniers etc attention le parcours est sportif grande montee acces a la grotte par un sentier muni dune main courante a flanc de falaise vous pouvez laisser vos velos au waypoint parking de la cache des cacas qui rigolent et revenir a votre cache mobile en 2 roues un peu de repos apres 25 kms de montee avant de partir munissezvous dun stylo dun lampe torche ou frontale une bouteille deau et un encas noubliez pas de relever les indices necessaire pour la cache bonus

siping is a small provincial town just south of changchun and 4 hours with a nice train south of harbin the whole area is a nice not so crowded north european climate like landscape ok i am from sweden probably that is why i love this part of chinai love chinese countryside with their narrow village streets where noone speeks english we asked through a translator how life was during the cold winters down to 30c or more and they say they spend the time on the kangs a kang is a big kind of wood stove bed the bed is warm and the rest of the house is cold ingenoius invention in this village just outside siping there is a big lake with some fish restaurants on the hill to visit and a new built hotel outside a small wooden factory producing wood horses there is a huge black statue of an animal the statue is not of a horse and not made of wood what is it kind of animal b i g that is the cache to find out and mail to me br gafs

jamnikov spodmol je manjsa jama pod skalno steno v kateri so bili odkrite sledi ki kazejo na to da so jamo nekje v casu med 9000 in 6000 let pred nasim stetjem obiskali takratni ljudje v jami je bila najdena koscena harpuna kremenov odbitek in nekaj fragmentov zob rjavega medveda najdbe so bile na podlagi analize oglja in koscene harpune umescene v kulturo srednje kamene dobe oz mezolitika skupaj z najdbami kamnitega orodja na belskem polju pod dolino poljane kjer je jamnikov spodmol so to najstarejsi dokazi clovekove prisotnosti v gornjesavski dolini jamnik rock shelter jamnikov spodmol is a small cave under a rock wall traces discovered in the cave indicate that somewhere in the period between 9000 and 6000 bc the cave was populated researchers found a bone harpoon a flint fragment and a few fragments of brown bear teeth the analysis of the charcoal and the bone harpoon place the findings in the middle stone age or mesolithic together with the stone tools found in the field belako polje that lies under the valley of poljane the findings of jamnikov spodmol are the oldest evidence of human presence in the gornjesavska valley

this cache can only be reached from the sea by boat kayak swimming etc its not accessible from the hiking track that runs through the zingaro reserve only by water boats can be rented in the nearby village castellammare del golfono boat driving license required where you will also find a parking spot for your car and in general a nice village to visit remember the anchoring limitations that does not allow any anchoring closer than 100m from the coastline and 300m from a beach the cache is located in the bay cala del varo that you will find approx 5 nautical miles ne of castellammare del golfo harbour you will easily find maps of zingaro natural reserve with all its bays in the village castellammare and its boat rental services the coordinates gives you your staring point but is not the actual position of the cache itself since its true position does not allow satellite coverage from here proceed direction sw for about 10m and you will be very close to find it finding the cache requires some advanced climbing no need for technical climbing or specific equipment but some previous experiences and good physics is required beware of loose rocks we recommended to in search of this cache make a full day out of it and explore the beautiful coast of zingaro by boat and the little resturants and castle of castellammare del golfo

grotta di nettuno neptunes grotto italian grotta di nettuno catalan cova de neptu is a stalactite cave near the town of alghero on the island of sardinia italy the cave was discovered by local fishermen in the 18th century and has since developed into a popular tourist attraction the grotto gets its name from the roman god of the sea neptune grotta di nettuno e una caverna di stalattite vicino allla cita di alghero in sardegna italia la grotta fu scoperta da un pescatore locale nel 18deg secolo e fin dallora si rivelo una popolare attrazione turistica la grotta prende il suo nome dalla divinita romana dell mare nettuno access to the cave accesso alla grotta the entrance to the grotto lies only around a metre above the sea level at the foot of the 110metrehigh capo caccia cliffs and the cave can therefore only be visited when the waters below are calm a stairway cut into the cliff in 1954 the 654step escala del cabirolgoats steps leads from a car park at the top of the cliff down to the entrance the grotto is also accessible via a short boat trip from the port of alghero these trips are arranged hourly during the summer but less frequently during spring and autumn the building of the staircase takes 10 years before the cave was accessible only by boat lingresso della grotta si trova a circa un metro sopra il livello del mare ai piedi dei 110 metri delle alte falesie di capo caccia e quindi si puo visitare solamente quando il mare e calmo una scalinata panoramica di 656 gradini costruita nel 1954 la cosidetta escala del cabirol la scala del capriolo conduce dal parcheggio in cima della scogliera alingresso la grotta e accessibile anche via mare con un imbarcazione che parte dal porto di alghero questi brevi viaggi sono organizzati ogni ora durante lestate ma meno frequentemente durante la primavera e lautunno la costruzione della scalinata e durata 10 anni prima la grotta era accessibile solo in barca a short cave description corta descrizione della grotta the combined length of the cave system is estimated to be around 4 kilometers but only a few hundred metres are accessible to the public inside are passages of lit stalactite and stalagmite formations and a 120metrelong saltwater lake which is at sea level the cave was once a habitat for the mediterranean monk seal which has become extinct in the area the history of the caves of neptune dates back to prehistoric times several tracks belonging to the neolithic found within them suggest that about 2000000 years have passed by since their formation its almost certain that the primitive men knew and use them according to their needs la lunghezza complessiva del sistema di grotte e stimata in circa 4 km ma solo poche centinaia di metri sono accessibili al pubblico allinterno ci sono passaggi di formazioni di stalattiti e stalagmiti illuminate e un lago di acqua salata di 120 metri di lunghezza che e al livello del mare la grotta era una volta un habitat per la mediteranea foca monaca che si e estinta nella zona la storia delle grotte di nettuno risale ai tempi preistorici diverse tracce appartenenti al neolitico rinvenute al loro interno fanno pensare che siano trascorsi circa 2000000 di anni dalla sua formazione e quasi certo che gli uomini primitivi le conoscessero e le utilizzassero in base alle proprie esigenze opening hours orari di apertura april daily from 1000 to 1700 may to october daily from 900 to 1900 november to march daily from 1000 to 1500 aprile tutti i giorni 10001700 maggioottobre tutti i giorni 9001900 novmar tutti i giorni eng the formation of stalactites and stalagmites we can trace the words stalactite and stalagmite back to the greek word stalassein which means to drip this is fitting because it describes how both are formed in nature although they look lifelike and a little creepy stalactites and stalagmites grow simply because of water running over and through inorganic material limestone caves where most stalactites and stalagmites are found are mainly composed of calcite a common mineral found in sedimentary rocks calcite molecules are made of calcium and carbonate ions and are referred to as caco3 or calcium carbonate when rainwater falls over a cave and trickles through rocks it picks up carbon dioxide and minerals from limestone if we add water carbon dioxide and calcium carbonate together we get this equation h20 + co2 + caco3 = ca hco32 ca hco32 is known as calcium bicarbonate and the water carries the substance basically dissolved calcite through the cracks of the roof of a cave once water comes into contact with the air inside the cave however some of the calcium bicarbonate is transformed back into calcium carbonate and calcite starts to form around the crack as water continues to drip the length and thickness of the calcite grows and eventually a stalactite forms on the ceiling it can take a very long time for most stalactites to form they usually grow anywhere between a quarterinch and an inch every century and now the most important questions are 1 try to describe why lot of stalactites in this cave did not grow in vertical way as usually are and each in the other direction 2 there is a plate dedicated to carlo alberto how many rows of text are on the plate 3 in the cave there is great decoration send me two names of embellishment inside the cave the exact name of those figures 4 option there is a area inside where is possible to do the picture so do one and post it you can log immediately with picture or send the answer via my profile and log after if the answers are not correct i will contact you cache it la formazione di stalattiti e stalagmiti la stalattite e una formazione calcarea pendente dalla sommita delle grotte soggette a fenomeni di carsismo si forma a seguito dei continui e prolungati depositi di minerali trasportati dalle acque percolanti nella grotta in particolare del bicarbonato di calcio che poi precipita in carbonato di calcio che si deposita e forma cosi la stalattite la stalattite ha generalmente una forma cilindrica o di cono allungato ma se la grotta e percorsa da correnti daria puo deviare dal suo asse verticale e assumere forme bizzarre quando una stalattite si congiunge a una stalagmite si ha la formazione di una colonna la formazione delle grandi stalattiti richiede tempi lunghissimi dellordine anche di migliaia di anni una curiosita e costituita da una forma iniziale di stalattite la cannula che si presenta come un tubicino semitrasparente attraverso cui passano le gocce dacqua se la volta della grotta ne presenta tante dal basso si ha la sensazione di una cascata di spaghetti il nome stalattite deriva dalla parola greca stalaktites stalaktites con il significato di gocciolante la stalattite piu lunga conosciuta si trova nella camera delle rarita nella gruta rei do mato sete lagoas minas geraisbrasile ed e lunga 20 metri 1 prova a descrivere il motivo per cui molte stalattiti nella grotta non si sono formati in modo verticale ma in ogni altra direzione 2 vi e un piatto dedicato a carlo alberto quante righe di testo sono sul piatto 3 la grotta e molto ornamentale e affascinante inviami i nomi di due formazioni allinterno della grotta il nome esatto di queste figure 4 opzione vi e una zona allinterno dove e possibile fare la foto quindi fatene una e mandatela e possibile accedere immediatamente con la foto o inviare la risposta tramite il mio profilo e accedere dopo se le risposte non sono corrette vi contatero

to find this cache you have to walk along and crawl through a creek which is located in a relative big cave for this area so one or more flashlights are recommendable also a helmet and old clothing will do a good job the cave is approximately 195 m long for more information just in slovenian you can visit he following link <url> please note that this cache is nothing for children people with claustrophobia andor arachnophobia and you will get wet d each geocacher is responsible for own actions never go alone in the cave take nothing from the cave leave nothing in the cave respect the nature to find this geocache you must park your car at the given parking coordinates on the left side of the valley there is a small creek follow this creek to the header coordinates here you see a nice 3 m waterfall spoiler pic1 when you in front of this small waterfall look at your right side there is the cave entry the first few meters are dry and easy to walk but then the cave gets very close you must crawl a few meters until the cave will become larger again but from now on you must crawl through the little creek which flows in the cave until you reach a relative large hall spoiler pic 2 now turn around and you will find the cachespoiler pic 3 take care of yourself and happy geocaching

la penisola di san vito lo capo e una lunga striscia di terra che si estende per circa 10 km e raggiunge una larghezza massima di 7 km il versante orientale della penisola che separa il golfo di castellammare da san vito e costellato da una catena di monti con direzione nordsud sulle cui pendici si aprono diverse cavita tra queste ce la grotta delluzzo unampia cavita absidiforme che si apre sulla omonima piana digradando dolcemente da una quota di 65 mslm verso la baia allinterno della riserva orientata dello zingaro sulla formazione della grotta e stata avanzata una ipotesi di formazione marina in base allevidenza di fori di litodomi sulle pareti i litodomi sono animali marini che hanno la caratteristica di trovare riparo nelle rocce piu dure forandole con una secrezione acida se ne dedurrebbe quindi che le pareti della grotta fossero a contatto delle onde del mare e dei sui effetti unaltra ipotesi invece ipotizza una formazione carsica in un territorio carsico lacqua piovana cadendo su un suolo formato principalmente da rocce calcaree non forma fiumi o torrenti ma penetra nelle fessure acqua e anidride carbonica combinate insieme sciolgono il carbonato di calcio contenuto nelle rocce trasformandosi in bicarbonato di calcio acqua con roccia disciolta lacqua penetrando per millenni nelle fratture del calcare le allarga fino a formare gallerie e sale hanno cosi origine le grotte splendide creazioni dellazione millenaria dellacqua dove possono svilupparsi stalattiti stalagmiti e una grande varieta di concrezioni la grotta delluzzo e anche uno dei piu importanti siti archeologici dellintera sicilia allinterno di essa sono state rinvenute tracce di presenze umane risalenti a circa 10000 anni fa probabilmente ancora anteriori sono i resti di alcuni animali ritrovati nellantro quali rinoceronti leoni e mammuth dallesame dei resti trovati sia umani che degli utensili da loro adoperati e stato possibile ricostruire con una certa approssimazione le loro abitudini di vita la stratificazione emersa dagli scavi fatti nella grotta ha altresi reso possibile conoscere levoluzione delluomo negli ultimi 10000 anni la comunita che occupava la grotta era costituita da un piccolo gruppo di cacciatori che vivevano nella zona la grotta doveva servire come riparo per la notte e difesa contro gli animali feroci con il passare dei secoli la comunita imparo a coltivare la terra ed a cibarsi del pesce che doveva essere copioso nel mare vicinissimo alla grotta le pareti interne della grotta hanno rivelato quella che puo essere definita una necropoli ante litteram evidentemente realizzata negli ultimi millenni a noi piu vicini i resti umani recuperati dagli scavi eseguiti nella grotta sono conservati presso il museo archeologico regionale di palermo una interessante lettura per ottenere il permesso di loggare come found it e necessario mandarci una mail e rispondere alle seguenti domande 1 che caratteristiche deve avere un territorio carsico a essere ricco di torrenti e fiumi b non avere torrenti e fiumi 2 da che tipo di roccia e formato prevalentemente un territorio carsico 3 una grotta di origine carsica e formata dallerosione di acqua dolce o salata 4 perche si ipotizza che la grotta sia stata originata dalla erosione del mare 5 in quale anno la grotta ottenne il suo primo riconoscimento dalla scienza ufficiale 6 per quanti anni presenta tracce di vita pur non essendo obbligatorio inviare una foto incoraggiamo a documentare la visita con qualche scatto the peninsula of san vito lo capo is a long strip of land that stretches for about 10 km and reaches a maximum width of 7 km the eastern side of the peninsula that separates the gulf of castellammare from san vito is dotted by a chain of mountains running from north to south on the slopes of which you can see different cavities among these is the grotto of the uzzo a large cavity that opens to the homonymous plain sloping gently from an altitude of 65 meters above sea level towards the bay within the reserve of the zingaro one hypothesis on the formation of the cave has been advanced on the evidence of the presence of marine mollusks holes on the walls these type of mollusks lithodomus are marine animals that have the feature to find shelter into the hardest rocks piercing them with an acid secretion the walls of the cave could then have been in contact with the waves of the sea and their effects another hypothesis supposes a karst formation in a karst area rainwater falling on a soil composed mainly of limestone cliffs does not creat rivers or streams but penetrates into the cracks water and carbon dioxide combined together dissolve the calcium carbonate content in rocks turning into calcium bicarbonate water with dissolved rock the water penetrates for millennia in fractures of the limestone to form tunnels and halls the cave delluzzo is also one of the most important archaeological sites in sicily within it traces of human presence were found dating back to about 10000 years ago probably older are the remains of animals found in the cave which rhinos lions and mammoths the stratification emerged from the excavations in the cave has also made it possible to know the evolution of man in the last 10000 years the community that occupied the cave was formed by a small group of hunters who lived in the area the cave served as a shelter for the night and defense against wild animals over the centuries the community learned to cultivate the land and feed on the fish that had to be abundant in the sea near the cave an interesting reading to obtain the permission to log in as found it it is necessary to send us an email and answer the following questions 1 which features should a karst area have a it should be rich in creeks and rivers b it should have no creeks or rivers 2 by which type of stone is a karst area composed of 3 is a karsic cave originated by the erosion of fresh water or salt water 4 why is it assumed that the cave was originated by the erosion of the sea 5 in which year did the cave obtained its first acknowledgment from the ufficial science 6 for about how many years have traces of life been present while not mandatory to send a photo we encourage you to document the visit with a few shots

jama pekel pekel cave jama pekel je kraska jama stara vec kot 3 milijone let in ima bogato zgodovino lezi sredi ponikvanskega krasa dobre 4 km severno od sempetra v savinjski dolini je ena najvecjih za turiste urejenih kraskih jam na stajerskem jamo je izdolbel tok potoka ponikvica ki pred jamo ponikne iz nje pa pritece z imenom peklenscica jama je odprta za obiskovalce po njej pa je speljana 1159 metrov dolga turisticna pot naloga za vpis obiska oglej si skalno steno ob vhodu v jamo v njej lahko opazis stevilne razpoke nastale zaradi potresov ki so jih sprozili premiki v zemeljski skorji najvecja razpoka je desno ob vhodu kaksna je priblizna dolzina te razpoke razmisli o tem kaksno vlogo so igrale skalne razpoke pri nastanku jame in v odgovoru napisi kratko obrazlozitev oceni priblizno visino stene nad vhodom v jamo s pomocjo informacij ki so ti na voljo v opisu razlozi priblizno koliko casa je voda potrebovala da je ustvarila razjedo skozi deset metrov skale zgornji del jame je kapnisko veliko bogatejsi kot spodnji del razmisli zakaj je temu tako in obrazlozi svoj odgovor pomembno pred vpisom obiska zemeljskega zaklada nama posljite odgovore preko sporocil ali gc profila ko poaljete vaae odgovore lahko vpiaete najdbo zaklada dodatnega dovoljenja ne potrebujete vpisi brez ustreznih odgovorov bodo izbrisani odgovorov na vpraaanja ne vpisujte v svoj log vpisi ki vsebujejo odgovore na vpraaanja bodo izbrisani veselilo naju bo ce boste svojemu vpisu najdbe prilozili kaksno zanimivo fotografijo nadaljujte z branjem obsirnejsega opisa v slovenscini the pekel cave is a karst cave with a long history its more than a 3 million years old and it lies in the middle of the ponikvanski kras region about 4 km north of sempeter v savinjski dolini the cave was created by the ponikvica stream that disappears in front of the cave and reappears in the cave as the peklenscica stream there is a 1159meters long path through the cave and the guided tours are available logging requirements observe the rock near the cave entrance notice a number of cracks all over the rock all those cracks were formed during the earthquakes caused by movement in the earths crust the biggest crack can be seen on the right side next to the cave entrance what is the approximate size of that crack think about what role did the cracks play in the process of forming the cave and explain your answer observe the rock where the cave entrance is and evaluate its overall height given the information on this listing about the age of the cave tell us approximatelly how long did it took for the water to dissolve through the ten meters of the rock the upper part of the cave is a treasury of cave structures how can you explain that there are more cave structures in the upper part of the cave important before you log the cache send us your answers in english language via message system or gc profile after sending the answers you can log your find you dont need to wait for log permission logs without an accompanying answers will be deleted do not write answer directly to your log logs containing answers to the questions will be deleted if you have taken any photos please upload them and attach them to your log continue to read the long english description jama pekel vhod v krasko jamo pekel se nahaja na nadmorski visini 275 metrov ker je v jami stalna temperatura 10degc se pozimi ko je notranja temperatura jame visja kot temperatura zunanjega zraka iz jamskega vhoda vcasih dviguje vodna para kar izgleda kot da iz jame prihaja dim nasim prednikom ki si tega pojava niso znali razloziti se je to zdelo strasljivo in bili so prepricani da temacna luknja v podzemlje ne more biti nic drugega kot vhod v pekel ki ga varuje v skalo vklesana podoba peklenscka na vhodu zato so jami nadeli ime jama pekel vhod v jamo pekel znacilnost jame pekel so ozke vodne tesni vecji in manjsi sifoni in ozke razpoke ki imajo v visjih predelih ohranjene fluvialne alohtone naplavine kar je tudi dokaz o pretoku vode ki danes tece po spodnjem delo jame povsod lahko opazimo tudi erozijske kotlice in fasete jama ima suho zgornjo ter spodnjo vodno etazo notranjost jame v spodnjem delu jame nas spremlja peklenscica s svojimi slapovi zasigane stene ter razlicne kapniske oblike od stalaktitov stalagmitov in kapniskih stebrov vse do kalcitnih kristalov je edina kraska jama v sloveniji kjer preko 4 metre visoke stopnje pada voda v slikovitem slapu slap v jami nad potjo ki vodi v zgornji del jame se boci naravni most ki je nastal z zdruzitvijo dveh sigastih grebenov zgornje suho nadstropje je s stalaktiti stalagmiti ponvicami in jezerci prava zakladnica kapnikov ta kapnisko bogatejsi del jame krasijo kapniki podobni spagetom cebulasti kapniki ponvice veliki stalaktit ki spominja na sop banan in velike kapniske orgle notranjost jame zgodovina jamskih raziskovanj za prvo omembo in zacetek urejanja jame je zasluzen zdravnik dr travber iz zalca ki je leta 1860 uredil jamo za obiskovalce in dal postaviti prve lesene brvi v zacetnem delu jame v drugi polovici 19 stoletja je za jamo izvedela sirsa javnost zasluge za to ima graski profesor reibenschuh ki je leta 1866 prvi strokovno raziskal jamo in kasneje svoje izsledke objavil v raznih publikacijah ponovno je zanimanje za jamo naraslo med leti 1890 in 1905 ko je za njo skrbel zalski tajnik ivan kac podpisi iz leta 1880 in pozneje dokazujejo da so jamo v prejsnjem stoletju radi obiskovali v njej pa naj bi prirejali celo zabave arheoloa ke najdbe jama pekel je edina jama v sloveniji v kateri so nasli neposredne ostanke kosti pracloveka drugod so nasli zgolj sledove kot so razno orodje orozje ognjisca in druge sledove njegovega obstoja zal pa nahajalisce ni dobro raziskano saj najdbe niso bile strokovno dokumentirane koordinate zemeljskega zaklada so postavljene na prostor pred vhodom v jamo kjer boste nasli podatke ki vam bodo v pomoc pri odgovorih na vprasanja za vpis zaklada notranjosti jame ni nujno obiskati vendar vam ogled jame zelo prioporocava nacrtujte torej svoj obisk kadar so organizirani vodeni ogledi urnik ogledov in ostale informacije najdete na spletni strani jame jama pekel viri spletna stran turisticnega drustva sempeter spletna stran in informacijske table zavoda rs za varstvo narave cave pekel entrance to the cave is at a height of 275 meters abowe the sea level the cave has constant internal temperature of 10degc thats why in the winter when the air temperature inside the cave is higher than the air temperature outside a smoke of vapours can be seen coming out of the cave our ancestors could not explain that natural phenomena thats why they were afraid of it they were certain that the black hole was an entrance to hell where the devil dwelt hence they named the cave pekel eng hell cave entrance the cave characteristics are narrow water passages large and small siphons and narrow cracks with preserved fluvial sediments which is a direct evidence of a water flow which today runs throught the lower part of the cave everywhere we can see the erosion potholes and facets on two floors the visitor can see two faces of one cave the water part and the dry part inside the cave through the lower water part of the cave runs the peklenscica stream leading to the bigest attraction in the cave a beautiful 4metre waterfall can be seen there the highest underground waterfall in slovenia that can be seen from the immediate vicinity underground waterfall in the water cave many stalactites stalagmites and columns can be seen as well as calcite crystals that glitter wonderfully in the light when you walk through the lower part of the cave the sound of water is always there the only exception is tihi rov eng the silent gallery which is completely silent and has great acoustics inside the cave a path leading from the lower part takes you up to the dry part of the cave the ascent is similar to walking up to the 13th floor of a building the upper part of the cave has stalactites and stalagmites rim stone pools and small lakes it is really a treasury of cave structures with spaghettilike stalactites bulbous dripstones large stalactites resembling a stalk of bananas and a great stalacpipe organ there is also a natural bridge arching over the path to the upper cave in the past there was running water in this part of the cave as well but it gradually moved to lower areas history of speleological research the first one to promote the cave and to arrange it for public view was dr tavber from zalec who had wooden footbridges set up in 1860 thus making the cave suitable for visitors the cave became very popular after professor reibenschuh from graz had published his expert findings in various publications in 1866 another period of caves popularity was between 1890 and 1905 when a secretary from zalec mr ivan kac was managing the cave signatures in the cave dating from 1880 and later prove that it was a popular destination already in the 19th century some say that even a number of parties were organized inside archeological finds pekel cave is the only cave in slovenia in which human bones were found in other caves only tools weapons fireplaces and other traces of prehistoric human existence were found unfortunately the research was not completed as the finds were not properly and professionally documented coordinates of this earthcache will lead you to the place near the cave entrance where you will find informations that will help you to answer the required questions visiting inside of the cave is not required but we highly recommend you to do it guided tours are available at the cave site for more information about and the opening hours visit their website pekel cave sources tourist society of sempeters website the institute of the republic of slovenia for nature conservations website and information billboards

google translate voir le descriptif de la serie cette multi vous fera decouvrir les galeries dune ancienne mine de bauxite le parcours ne presente pas de grande difficulte mais la notation t5 est justifiee par son caractere souterrain ne pas sy aventurer seul un bon eclairage par personne verifier letat des piles avant de partir attention a la presence dun puits au fond dune galerie aucun indice ne sy trouve pensez a emmener le plan de la mine cidessous indispensable pour localiser et identifier les indices sur place ainsi quune lampe uv lampe uv on nous a demande plusieurs fois ou en trouver en faisant une recherche sur internet avec les mots lampe torche uv vous trouverez facilement des modeles tres abordables en aluminium et a led la notre a coute moins de 10eur port compris et fonctionne parfaitement un accessoire indispensable dans la trousse du geocacheur etape 1 entree de la mine avec les indices abcde recoltes dans les caches 1 a 5 calculez les coordonnees de lentree de la mine ainsi n 43deg44u e 004deg46v u = a x b x d + c x e v = a x c x d x e + 13 + b lentree est situee a 10 metres dun chemin facile dacces mais bien cachee par la vegetation merci de laisser la vegetation intacte pour preserver la discretion de cet acces etape 2 indices souterrains a laide du plan retrouvez les 6 indices abcdef dissimules dans les galeries 5 indices ne sont visibles quavec une lampe uv merci de ne pas les toucher svp attention pendant les periodes humides le sol peut etre un peu boueux par endroit la mine dite du mas de guerre a ete exploitee probablement a la fin du xixeme siecle les galeries assez etroites etaient creusees a la pioche et a lexplosif tandis que la bauxite etait evacuee manuellement dans de petits wagonnets tires par un mulet dans la galerie menant a lancienne entree bouchee on peut encore deviner au sol les traces des rails qui ont ete retires a la fin de lexploitation dans le reseau inferieur difficile dacces une galerie plus large peutetre contemporaine de la mine des canonnettes et creusee avec des engins modernes senfonce dans les profondeurs mais est tres vite noyee si vous apercevez une chauvesouris dormir au plafond veillez a ne pas la deranger pas de bruit a proximite pas de lumiere sur elle ni de flash svp cest une espece protegee et fragile particulierement durant la periode dhibernation de novembre a avril prenez aussi le temps dobserver par endroit les jolies petites concretions de calcite blanche encore modestes mais deja largement centenaires etape 3 tri selectif une fois tous les indices en poche reprenez la voiture pour vous rendre sur un autre site dexploitation de la bauxite aux coordonnees suivantes parking a proximite n 43deg43abc e 004deg48def apres avoir trouve un recipient contenant 10 pieces de monnaies calculez les deux indices permettant dobtenir les coordonnees de la cache finale x = somme des valeurs des pieces en aluminium y = somme des valeurs des autres pieces etape 4 cache finale la cache vous attend au fond dune petite galerie a quelques metres de lentree dont les coordonnees sont n 43deg43x 20 + 34 e 004deg47y 25 + 12 attention au plafond bas lampe indispensable pendant les periodes humides le sol peut etre boueux par endroit ici comme dans dautres sites pres des baux de provence des quantites relativement faibles de bauxite ont ete extraites de facon artisanale a la fin du xixeme siecle directement a ciel ouvert ou dans de petites galeries souterraines en effet la couche de bauxite epaisse de quelques metres a peine et de moindre qualite faible teneur en alumine senfonce rapidement en profondeur ce qui rendait son extraction difficile et peu rentable avec les moyens de lepoque la nature a depuis repris ses droits et les vestiges de ces sentiero che gia dopo pochi metri sembra offrirti 3 soluzioni scegli quella centrale poi la strada giusta sara sempre segnalata correttamente passeggiata abbastanza impegnativa di circa unora nel complesso tra andata e ritorno non e un percorso che offre grandi viste panoramiche ma e suggestivo perche con mille sfaccettature che riescono ad impegnarti e a divertirti in questo periodo luglioagosto si puo essere accompagnati dal richiamo dei falchi che volano appena sopra il bosco le coordinate del cache finale potrebbero non essere precisissime in quanto non prendeva molto bene il gps contate sullaiuto path that already after a few meters seems to offer 3 solutions choose the middle one then the right way will always be reported correctly a walk challenging enough about an hour for the round trip it isnt a path that offers great views but it is suggestive because with many facets that give some fun at this time july august you can walk with hawks that fly just above the forest the coordinates of the final cache may not be very precise because it does not take very good gps you can count on the aid

non potevamo certo dimenticare di mettere un cache in uno dei posti piu suggestivi e caratteristici del nostro piteglio negli anni 70 il nostro parroco noto che vicino al paese cera una specie di grotta che assomigliava a quella di lourdes nel 1975 i proprietari del terreno lo donarono alla curia e don giuseppe vi fece collocare un piccolo altare e due statue una raffigurante la madonna e laltra bernadette la grotta prende il nome dal piccolo torrente che le scorre accanto il rio buio nel mese di maggio di sera si celebra una messa dedicata alla madonna fino a pochi anni fa veniva anche fatta una processione lungo la via crucis che dallabitato di piteglio portava fino alla grotta del rio buio tutto il paese vi prendeva parte e portava un fiore alla vergine purtroppo ormai la via crucis e quasi del tutto scomparsa e con lei pian piano anche lusanza della processione il cache e posizionato in un punto che non ha una copertura gps ottimale a causa della vegetazione speriamo che lindizio vi sia daiuto buona caccia a tutti

presso le coordinate si lascia il sentiero principale e ci si inoltra nel bosco per una ventina di metri si vede limboccatura di una specie di grotta in realta e semplicemente la zona dombra di un masso veramente enorme che poggia su altri detriti di dimensione appena inferiore quando si giunge presso la fenditura che penetra piu a fondo e che di fatto costituisce la grotta si e su una specie di ristretto altipiano guardare alla propria destra personalmente ho contato 15 passi si va a destra verso una situazione simile a quella della grotta ma molto molto piu piccola e nel bosco aperto dove e nascosta la cache in pratica ce un sasso bianco alla stessa altezza di dove si e giunti cercare nel suo piccolo anfratto aiutarsi con le coordinate nb data la giornata estrememente piovosa non fare troppo affidamento sulle coordinate

la grotta della sinaiolasi trova sotto il passo della colla di casaglialungo un sentiero che porta a razzuolo la grotta fu scavata dallorganizzazzione todt durante il secondo conflitto mondiale ed era utilizzata come magazzino per rifornimenti e munizioni oggi la grotta e parzialmente visitabilein quanto una frana internaha interrotto il proseguimentofino allaltra parte della montagna allinterno della grotta della sinaiolavive il raro geco tritone dal passo della colla fonte dellalpesi prende la stradella a dxa fianco di una struttura pericolantee si arriva ad una grande casa fattoria dellalpe subito prima della casasi svolta nettamente a dx lungo uno stradello in discesaed in breve si arriva alla grotta 10 min circa essendo la zona molto folta di vegetazioneil gps mi dava un errore di 20 metri sulle coordinatema non dovrebbe causare problemi sulla ricercain quanto la grotta si trova proprio al lato del sentiero

historisches bergwerk bartholomaberg gluck auf historisches bergwerk in bartholomaberg seit dem jahr 2010 ist das historische bergwerk bartholomaberg das einzige schaubergwerk vorarlbergs wieder geoffnet bei der restauration des berg werks wurde besonders auf die erhaltung des unverfalschten historischen charakters geachtet rund 120 meter des stannastollens dessen tatsachliche lange unbekannt ist konnten fur die besucher zuganglich gemacht werden unter fachkundiger fuhrung erlebt man die faszination eines historischen bergwerkes und lernt uber die kargen und harten arbeitsbedingungen der bergknappen in langst vergangenen zeiten zu beachten feste wanderschuhe du musst trittsicher sein das eigenstandige begehen des bergwerkes ist verboten gehzeit bis zum historischen bergwerk ca 50 minuten die besichtigung des historischen bergwerkes ist kostenpflichtig der cache kann auch ohne besichtigung geloggt werden kosten erwachsen eur 7 kinder bis 14 jahren eur 350 weitere informationen unter <url> stift bitte selbst mitbringen achte auf die natur und respekiere deine grenzen jeder ist fur sein tun selbst verantwotlich ich ubernehmen keine haftung bis bald im wald die4a

ihren heutigen namen bekam die hohle vom desserteur engelbert karner dieser hielt sich im 1 weltkrieg 1915 1918 hier versteckt um nicht zum militardienst ins kaiserliche heer eingezogen zu werden er beschaffte sich heimlich essen bei den umliegenden bauern angeblich wurde er des ofteren von der militarstreife verfolgt aber nie erwischt auch im 2 weltkrieg 1938 1945 diente die hohle als zufluchtsort und versteck fur die habseligkeiten der bevolkerung uber jahrhunderte hinweg wurde sie aber als schmugglerversteck benutzt engelbert karner hat seine taschenlampe in der hohle vergessen in der hohle hinter einem stein also braucht ihr zum suchen nicht unbedingt eine taschenlampe mit nehmen fur alle die aber gerne mit der eigenen taschenlampe auf suche gehen wollen nehmt sie bitte mit da die hohle sehr versteckt ist hab ich die koordinaten ausserhalb der hohle angegeben der cache befindet sich aber in der hohle

su un costone della montagna grande raggiungibile dalla contrada di siba e possibile accedere alla sauna di benikula potrebbe sembrare allinizio come la stufa di kazen ma nessun intervento umano e mai avvenuto e la natura vulcanica dellisola ha la sua piu alta manifestazione in questo luogo impervio un po difficile da raggiungere ma di rara bellezza ed originalita allinterno di un anfratto dove sorgono sedili in pietra lavica forti vapori consentono di fare delle saune rigeneranti al tramonto o al mattino con la vista di un paesaggio tipico molto suggestivo

buxiereslesmines est une commune francaise situee dans le departement de lallier en region auvergne au xixe siecle lexploitation des mines de charbon transforme la commune cest en 1880 que la commune auparavant denommee buxiereslagrue devient buxiereslesmines la mine est definitivement fermee en 2000 <url> ce cache est cache pres du terril carbonnier que reste dans un terrain boise au nord de buxiereslesmines on peut voir le sommet de ce terril au distance mais aussi quand on marche ca 30 metres au nord du site du cache a cote du petit chemin om voix aussi des autres petites rues fermees qui viennent aux usines des mines malheuresement lacces aux terrains des usines maintenant boises est interdit partout mais on peut promener dans les petites rues rurales voir pour l histoire des mines de buxieres ce site si on veux voir plus de lhistoire miniere de la region on peut visiter la musee de mines a noyant dallier <url>

this geocache is located in the underground forest on the north slope of changbai mountain take a scenic walk and enjoy the wildlife you must go to a ground zero on a bus after entering the park from this point you may choose one of four destinations one of them being the underground forest i also highly recommend going to the peak of the mountain to see the lake you will arrive at the underground forest and take the maint trail apto navigate to the cache you will find that there are many people maybe way too many depending on the time of the year beware of muggles do not stray too far from the main path as they are trying to preserve the grass this cache is most suitable in the summer in the winter the trail is not accessible best of luck location erdao baihe er dao bai he er dao bai he town antu an tu an tu county yanbian yan bian yan bian city transportation take train or bus to antu county at yanbian city and then take special tourist minibus to erdao baihe town admission fee cny 168 including the bus ticket in the scenic area
