il cache e nascosto sulle prealpi orobiche a grotta dei pagani la grotta dei pagani e un anfratto naturale che si trova nel massiccio della presolana ai piedi delle pareti verticali del lato sud della presolana occidentale per alcuni la grotta dei pagana e la meta finale della gita per altri invece e il punto di partenza per limpegnativa salita della via normale alla presolana occidentale la grotta dei pagani raggiunge in inverno il massimo della sua attrattiva quando il freddo congela lo stillare continuo delle gocce che cadono continuamente dal soffitto formando contemporaneamente delle stalattiti e stalagmiti di ghiaccio che assumo forme varie i piu fantasiosi ci vedono un presepe di ghiaccio in inverni piu rigidi queste stalgmiti e stalattiti si uniscono formando delle vere e proprie colonne di ghiaccio le cime principali del massiccio della presolana sono costituite da roccia calcarea formano una catena che andando da ovest ad est comprende la presolana di castione2474 m la presolana occidentale la piu elevata 2521 m la presolana del prato 2447 m la presolana centrale 2517 m la presolana orientale 2490 m ed il monte visolo 2369 m il gps ti porta allesterno della grotta per trovare questo cache bisogna entrare e cercare sotto i sassi che si trovano sopra una piccola cengia a sinistra dellingresso vedi eventualmente la foto spoiler che riprende il gruppo di sassi tra i quali e nascosto il cache andare in montagna e una bellissima pratica sportiva va affrontata con la giusta preparazione e conoscenza vestitevi adeguatamente portatevi da mangiare e da bere a sufficenza e lasciate sempre detto a qualcuno dove state andando e quale percorso intendete fare ipotizzando anche eventuali variazioni di percorso

nan hu gong yuan nanhu park deutsche beschreibung folgt unten attention opening hours daily between 0800am and 1700pm a short multi cache in the northern part of the largest park in changchun cache is a petling look at spoiler pic beware of muggles all stations except the final are virtual you have to walk about 1 kilometer the trating is because of the first stage the south lake park initially built in 1933 is located in the southwest of changchun city with a total area of more than 222 million square meters it is referred to as the largest park in changchun only second to the summer palace in terms of scale the gardens there were decorated with distinctive characteristics the water area is approximately 92 million square meters you can find a lot of attractions on the caching route the stations 1 the cache begins in front of a entry door of the park in the middle of the roundabout at the listing coords go to the inner circle of the roundabout and count the lamppoles which lightens up the middle spot of the roundabout the sum is a 2 the second stage is in the park at n43deg 51 35a+10 | e125deg 180 6a which year is written in the tower sculpture the answer is b 3 the third stage is in the park at n43deg 51 b4a97 | e125deg 18 b28a120 how many houses are there the answer is c final the final location ist at n43deg 51 bca246 | e125deg 18 bca136 good luck achtung offnungszeiten des parks sind taglich von 0800 bis 1700 uhr ein kurzer multicache im nordlichen teil des grossten parks in changchun gesucht wird ein petling beachte das spoilerbild achtung muggle alle stationen sind virtuel ausser das finale naturlich die wegstrecke ist etwa einen kilometer lang die twertung ist wegen der ersten station so gewahlt der sudliche see park wurde bereits 1933 angelegt und liegt im sudwesten von changchun er hat eine flache von uber 222 millionen quadratmetern davon sind etwa 92 millionen wasserflache und hat den ruf als grosster aller parks in changchun die garten sind mit unverwechselbar chinesischen dekorationen ausgeschmuckt auf eurer geocacheroute konnt ihr allerlei attraktionen finden die stationen 1 der cache beginnt vor einem der eingange in den park in der mitte des kreisverkehrs an den listingkoordinaten geht in den inneren kreis des kreisverkehrs und zahlt die laternenmasten die nachts die mitte des kreisverkehrs ausleuchten die anzahl ist a 2 die zweite station ist im park bei n43deg 51 35a+10 | e125deg 180 6a welches jahr ist im turm eingehauen die antwort ist b 3 die dritte station ist im park bei n43deg 51 b4a97 | e125deg 18 b28a120 wie viele hauser stehen hier die antwort ist c finale die finale station ist im park bei n43deg 51 bca246 | e125deg 18 bca136 viel gluck

notredame de lourdes grotte paroisse de buix annee de construction 1952 batie par les paroissiens de buix dediee a notredame de lourdes historique cest a linitiative du cure de lepoque m labbe georges chevrolet que la grotte a ete construite les statues sont loeuvre dun paroissien m joseph froidevaux et la barriere construite par le marechal du village m marcel rerat affectation actuelle ce lieu de recueillement est encore tres frequente par les gens de buix mais aussi ceux des villages environnants et de france voisine chaque annee le dimanche apres le 15 aout une procession aux flambeaux est organisee

it was winter 2019 the kandersteg international scout centre had long discarded caving as an evening activity for guests yet three shorties accompanied by another very patient pinkie decided to explore this cave on a beautiful night of february after the amazing experience they decided to share this place with other adventurous people who may want to explore the beauty of winter in the bernese oberland by making one of the few caches in town that you can actually find during the cold season about the cave the mamilchhohle also called mamilchloch is situated on a hill behind of waldhotel doldenhorn it goes a few hundred meters into the mountain and its the ideal location to have your first caving experience being known by locals for quite some time the name and current geological composition of the cave suggest it was once used for extraction of moonmilk a white creamy substance found inside limestone caves and used for a variety of purposes including medicine getting moonmilk from a cave required a twoman twoday effort and attention to details such as the phase of the moon as it was said that our satellite deposited moonmilk in a cave only during the three days of full moon the etymology of mamilch has two possible origins either it comes from the mispronounciation of mondmilch moonmilk in german or from a deviation of mannmilch mans milk explained by the belief that little men worked in the caves to make sure the moonmilk was prepared to be collected either way the cave has been vastly explored throughout the years with people going 200m into the cave to find a strong waterfall and a lake as reported by the newspaper limpartial back in 1906 the cache the cache consists in a medium container with a lot of scout items available to trade and it is hidden at the start of the underground corridors to access it head to the first waypoint where you can park your vehicle and then start going behind the hotel at a certain point theres a small rope to help you get to the entrance despite being in the very beginning you should still bring a helmet and old clothes if youre going to look for it after finding the cache theres a lot more you can explore and in winter you can actually go further than during summer but be careful where youre stepping at all times and dont trust the ropes or ladders left behind with your life those are very old and may not be able to support your weight anymore that being said always follow the cito rule cash in trash out and enjoy mother natures work of art

mine de la coste trois mines ont fonctionne a durfort valensole la grande vernissiere et la coste certaines datent peutetre de la prehistoire pour des grattages superficiels mais cest a lepoque romaine et surtout a partir du xiie siecle quelles sont exploitees elles produisent dabord de lalquifoux sulfure de plomb qui sert en poterie pour vernir entre autres les vases danduze au xviiie siecle les mines dabord utilisees occasionnellement sont prises en concession entre 1810 et 1839 a partir de 1850 lextraction du zinc se propage sorte de ruee vers le zinc plusieurs dizaines de durfortois travaillent dans les 3 mines de durfort et a st felix de pallieres entre 1870 et 1910 apres la 1ere guerre mondiale la tendance est a la baisse avec une legere reprise apres la seconde guerre mondiale et particulierement de 1954 a 1970 apres 1971 les mines de durfort sont fermees seules quelques compagnies cherchent du petrole ou de luranium nous sommes ici a la mine de la coste proche du mas de cabanis dont les proprietaires lexploitent au xviiie siecle la mine de la coste est en fonctionnement en 1791 en 1811 elle est recuperee par le gendre du proprietaire du mas de cabanis m pascal de vallongue en lan ix les proprietaires des terrains aux alentour lexploitent conjointement cest pourtant m pascal de vallongue qui en obtient la concession en 1839 la societe des mines de pallieres la rachete en 1847 et developpe la production industrielle la mine est amodiee en 1874 pour 10 ans a la societe des zincs francais puis a la societe de la vieille montagne en 1884 elle est sous amodiee en 1899 au syndicat des mines dalloue dambernac en 1901 cest la societe miniere du gard qui lacquiert la production maximale atteint 2041 tonnes en 1906 au total 7718 tonnes de minerai marchand sont vendues entre 1901 et 1908 la presence de fluor dans la blende qui comprend pourtant 30 de zinc rend sa purification difficile et sa commercialisation aussi cela explique les changements frequents dexploitant en 1908 la societe miniere du gard est en liquidation la mine de la coste reste inexploitee pendant 45 ans la cheminee de la laverie est detruite en 1925 pourtant la societe de la vieille montagne lachete en 1953 pour 135 000 francs elle est exploitee de 1953 a 57 puis la production reprend en 1967 pour compenser la baisse de rendement des mines de pallieres 15 mineurs travaillent a durfort de 1967 a 1971 130 600 tonnes de minerai sont acheminees jusqua la laverie de st felix de pallieres abandonnee en 1971 ce sont 15 mineurs qui sont licencies a durfort et 170 au total en 1994 lunion miniere de france renonce aux concessions les puits et galeries sont combles la baume des morts que tu viens peutetre de decouvrir confondue avec une galerie est bouchee quelques recherches sont effectuees en 194748 pour trouver du petrole et en 1975 la compagnie francaise des minerais duranium obtient un permis de 3 ans pour trouver de luranium en three mines worked in durfort valensole grande vernissiere and la coste some may date from prehistory for superficial scratching but it is in roman times and especially from the twelfth century that they are exploited they produce first of all the alquifoux lead sulphide which is used in pottery to varnish among others vases of anduze in the eighteenth century mines used occasionally are taken into concession between 1810 and 1839 from 1850 the extraction of zinc spreads a kind of rush to zinc several dozens of durfortois work in the 3 durfort mines and st felix de pallieres between 1870 and 1910 after the 1st world war the trend is down with a slight recovery after the second world war and particularly from 1954 to 1970 after 1971 the durfort mines are closed only a few companies are looking for oil or uranium we are here at la coste mine close to the farmhouse of cabanis whose owners exploit it in the eighteenth century the mine of coste is in operation in 1791 in 1811 it is recovered by the soninlaw of the owner of the farmhouse of cabanis mr pascal de vallongue in the year ix the owners of the lands around it exploit it jointly it is however mr pascal de vallongue who obtains the concession in 1839 the company of mines of pallieres buys it in 1847 and develops the industrial production the mine was leased in 1874 for 10 years to the society of french zincs then to the society of the old mountain in 1884 it is under amodiee in 1899 to the alloue mines association of ambernac in 1901 the societe miniere du gard acquired it the maximum production reached 2041 tons in 1906 a total of 7718 tons of commercial ore are sold between 1901 and 1908 the presence of fluorine in the blende which comprises however 30 of zinc makes its purification difficult and its marketing also this explains the frequent changes of operator in 1908 the mining company of gard is in liquidation the mine of la coste remains untapped during 45 years the chimney of the launderette is destroyed in 1925 however the society of the old mountain buys it in 1953 for 135 000 francs it is exploited from 1953 to 57 and the production resumes in 1967 to compensate for the yield reduction of the pallieres mines 15 miners work in durfort from 1967 to 1971 130600 tons of ore were transported to the laundry of st felix de pallieres abandoned in 1971 there are 15 miners who are dismissed in durfort and 170 in total in 1994 the union miniere de france renounces the concessions the wells and galleries are filled la baume des morts which you may have discovered confused with a gallery is blocked some research is done in 194748 to find oil and in 1975 the french company of uranium minerals obtains a license of 3 years to find uranium

cave vinicole de st hilaire cette cave batie en 1950 elle fut agrandie en 1956 suite a lhiver rigoureux pour creer des stocks pour ameliorer la qualite du vin il est utilise le kilodegre comme reference ce qui eut comme effet de remplacer les vieilles vignes par des cepages plus nobles au debut la cave ne faisait que la vinification ensuite elle soccupa du negoce de vin sur le batiment une sirene sonnait 4 fois par jour pour les vendanges en 1979 elle a vinifie 25 495 hectolitres de vins de table pour le compte de 240 adherents cultivant 386 hectares de vignes la fermeture de cette cave est due aux primes que leurope donnait incitants les producteurs a arracher leurs vignes

naravni most in jama trnovski gozd sestavljajo planote trnovski gozd nanos hrusica in banjsice ter dolina trebusnice celotno obmocje je pokrito 80 z gozdnogospodarskimi povrsinami na obmocju trnovskega gozda nanosa in hrusice prevladujejo strnjeni gozdovi s posameznimi gozdnimi jasami medtem ko so na banjski planoti gori in v dolini trebusice mozaicno prepletajo kmetijske povrsine z gozdom dve tretjini povrsja trnovskega gozda lezi med 500 in 1000 m nadmorske visine na severni strani je ocitna tektonska zasnovanost ob dinarsko usmerjenem idrijskem prelomu na jugu pa se kazejo rezultati tektonskega narivanja mezozojskih apnencev in dolomitov na mlajsi eocenski flis v celoti dve tretjini povrsja pokrivajo apnenci cetrtino dolomit ostalo pa flis in nesprijeto gradivo nad lijakom prav na prepadnem robu trnovskega gozda predira skalni pomol naravni most skozno isto ime pa oznacuje tudi spodmol oziroma kratko jamo priblizno 15 m dolg in okoli 10 m visok naravni most je nastal hkrati s spodmolom saj je most le podaljsek oboka nad jamo leta je dolga okoli 15 m in ima zasigano dno s skalnega pomola je izreden razgled na vipavsko dolino in furlanijo domacini pripovedujejo da je general borojevic avstrijski komandant soske fronte s skoznega opazoval goriski del bojisca apnenec je sorazmerno odporna kamnina ki pa ima to lastnost da ga voda raztaplja po nastalih razpokah pronica dezevnica ki spotoma topi kamnino v smeri vodnih tokov pocasi nastajajo rovi in dvorane tako je nastala tudi jama in naravni most z raztapljanjem kamnine je jamski strop vedno tanjsi in ta se lahko zaradi lastne teze nazadnje tudi porusi to se je v daljni preteklosti dogodilo tudi tu erozija je premikanje materijala zaradi vetra vode ledu gravitacije ali delovanja zivih organizmov ki neprestano spreminja obliko zemeljskega povrsja sodi med eksogene povrsinotvorne procese saj za razliko od endogenih npr vulkanski izbruhi znizuje zemeljsko povrsje cetudi erozija mnogokrat poteka s preperevanjem je treba ta pojma razlikovati saj slednji pomeni razpadanje kamnine in nastajanje prsti prvi pa odnasanje prsti erozija je pomemben naravni proces danes pa je mnogokrat povecan zaradi clovekove aktivnosti in kot tak skodljiv na tak nacin ga najveckrat povzroca krcenje gozdov prekomerna pasnja in gradnja prometnih poti problem erozije clovek skusa tudi fotografije natural bridge and cave over the edge of the trnovski forest the natural bridge skozno was created and the same name also has cave here about 15 m long and about 10 m high natural bridge was also created here bridge is only an extension of the the cave cave has about 15 meters from the rocky pier is a wonderful view of the vipava valley and friuli a natural bridge is a rock formation where an arch has formed with an opening underneath natural arch is formed when inland cliffs are subject to erosion from weathering natural arch is formed from narrow fins and sea stacks composed of sandstone the formations become narrower due to erosion over geologic time scales the softer rock stratum erodes away creating rock shelters or alcoves on opposite sides of the formation beneath the relatively harder stratum or caprock above it the alcoves erode further into the formation eventually meeting underneath the harder caprock layer thus creating an arch the erosional processes exploit weaknesses in the softer rock layers making cracks larger and removing material more quickly than the caprock however the caprock itself continues to erode after an arch has formed which will ultimately lead to collapse erosion is the geological process in which earthen materials are worn away and transported by natural forces such as wind or water physical erosion physical erosion describes the process of rocks changing their physical properties without changing their basic chemical composition physical erosion often causes rocks to get smaller or smoother landslides and other forms of mass wasting are associated with physical weathering these processes cause rocks to dislodge from hillsides and crumble as they tumble down a slope plant growth can also contribute to physical erosion in a process called bioerosion plants break up earthen materials as they take root and can create cracks and crevices in rocks they encounter erosion by water liquid water is the major agent of erosion on earth rain rivers floods lakes and the ocean carry away bits of soil and sand and slowly wash away the sediment erosion by wind wind is a powerful agent of erosion aeolian winddriven processes constantly transport dust sand and ash from one place to another in dry areas windblown sand can blast against a rock with tremendous force slowly wearing away the soft rock it polishes rocks and cliffs until they are smoothgiving the stone a socalled desert varnish erosion by ice ice usually in the form of glaciers can erode the earth and create dramatic landforms in frigid areas and on some mountaintops glaciers move slowly downhill and across the land as they move they transport everything in their path from tiny grains of sand to huge boulders rocks carried by glaciers scrape against the ground below eroding both the ground and the rocks in this way glaciers grind up rocks and scrape away the soil moving glaciers gouge out basins and form steepsided mountain valleys eroded sediment called moraine is often visible on and around glaciers other forces of erosion mass wasting describes the downward movement of rocks soil and vegetation mass wasting incidents include landslides rockslides and avalanches mass wasting can erode and transport millions of tons of earth reshaping hills and mountains and often devastating communities in its path here are the questions for logging this cache as found please send the reply through the contact form but do not wait for my reply log it right away 1 take a look on a natural bridge and shortly describe how it was formed and what kind of erosion created it what do you think the bridge will last forever or will it change its look over time optional 1 if you want you can make some photos and add them to your log

fren plein coeur du condroz liegeois la commune douffet est situee a deux pas de durbuy et a 30 km de liege ouffet est lune des moins peuplees de la province et est composee de plus de moitie de terrains agricoles et de presque un quart de bois et forets ce qui rend ouffet un point de depart ideal pour de nombreuses balades celleci nommee balade du facteur part de la ferme de himbe et y revient apres 27 km quelques indices pour la mystery mais aussi un denivele de 100m preparez vos mollets ici on la prolonge jusque la petite grotte proche pour se reposer un peu avant la montee quelque soit le sens ici cest dangereux et il nest pas necessaire de descendre dans la grotte attention aux chutes de pierres si vous etes plusieurs nlin het hart van condroz liegeois ligt de gemeente ouffet in de buurt van durbuy en op 30 km van luik ouffet is een van de minst bevolkte in de provincie en bestaat uit meer dan de helft van de landbouwgrond en bijna een kwart van de bossen dat maakt ouffet een ideaal startpunt voor vele wandelingen deze genaamd du facteur postman wandeling verlaat de boerderij van himbe en keert terug na 27 km enkele aanwijzingen voor het mysterie maar ook een daling van 100m maak je kuiten klaar hier wordt het uitgebreid naar de nabijgelegen kleine grot om een beetje te rusten voor de klim ongeacht de richting van het pad hier is het gevaarlijk en hoef je niet naar de grot te gaan pas op voor vallende stenen als uw enkelen zijn enin the heart of condroz liegeois the commune of ouffet is located close to durbuy and 30 km from liege ouffet is one of the least populated in the province and is composed of more than half of agricultural land and almost a quarter of woods and forests that makes ouffet an ideal starting point for many walks this walk called du facteur postman leaves the farm of himbe and returns after 27 km some clues for the mystery but also a drop of 100m prepare your calves here it is extended to the nearby small cave to rest a little before the climb whatever the return path its dangerous here and you dont have to go to the cave beware of falling stones if you are few people podium

mistech nachazi vstupy do podzemi puvodni ucel podzemnich prostor neni znam mohlo se jednat o pruzkumne pripadne vydusne stoly nebo stoly k domacke tezbe uhli pripadne sklepy a pozdeji doslo k uprave soukroma ale zadne omezeni tu zatim neni druha stola je prave onou jeskyni o ktere mluvi nazev kese stejne jako jeji mensi sousedka byla i ona vytvorena lidmi puvodne se mohlo jednat o stolu k rucnimu account its long black coal mining history it can hardly surprise anyone that there is plenty of underground spaces beneath ostrava but very few people so far knows that there is also a cave when you take a walk along the bicycle path from the silesian ostrava castle to hranecnik you may notice deep in the undergrowth at you lefthand side a 100meterlong and 10meter high abandoned quarry the local rock was used both for the construction of the castle itself and most likely also for the houses in the nearby vicinity from the castle is derived the very name of this rock complex the castle conglomerate it is one of the few carboniferous outcrops in the czech part of the upper silesian coal basin the vast majority of all other parts of the upper silesian carboniferous are covered with quaternary sediments consisting mainly of coarsegrained sandstone with unique deposits of coaly claystones and gray siltstones and claystones in sandstones there are light gray quartz grains abundant are also yellowish feldspars partially disintegrated by weathering there are also spots of light and dark mica muscovites and biotite these you can sometimes see also in the siltstones and claystones the pictures show how the quarry looked like in the 1950s the vicinity of the quarry used to be inhabited once bud now you can find only scattered remains of walls and infilled cellars buried in the undergrowth at the quarry face bottom there are in two spots the entrances to the underground the original purpose of the underground spaces is not known it could have been an exploratory adit air adit or primitive homeuse mining pits later on modified into bombshelters the first adit is smaller and easily accessible with a certain degree of dexterity you can go and take a look inside because the germs of life began to create here small aquatic organisms and insects please behave attentive when inside right behind the masonry partition at the righthand side of the entrance this is attribute typical of a bombshelter the protection from the pressure wave watch for the puddle it is deeper than it seems the drift continues through two corners and ends in a caving there are several ways to get here easiest is to take a trail from the bicycle path through the undergrowth pedestrians are not allowed on the bicycle path so be careful not to get crashed by a cyclist second way is to cross the meadow southwestwards starting from hradni street and then traverse along the slope eastwards although the meadow is a private property there is so far no access restriction the second adit is just the cave that the cache name speaks of much as its small neighbor it was created by people it could have been a primitive homeuse mining adit before the roof collapse there were coal veins visible especially in the right part of the entrance area and in the southern part of the main space or an air adit for the neighboring mines trojice trinity jan maria and zarubek and later on modified into bombshelter after a massive roof collapse due to inundace and danking during the floods in 1997 a socalled gravitational cave was created a cave space created from the original cracks here adits expanded by the effects of natural influences and the movement of the massif the underground space in todays state is not explored although some attempts are under way for security reasons the entrance is walled and covered do not try to get inside the access is a little worse than to the first adit and again from the cycle path along a not very clear trail on the left side of the trail there is a concrete building on the slope of an unclear purpose probably entrance to another bomb shelter the entrance is covered for safety reasons the cache is placed outside near the entrance to the first smaller adit to find it you do not have to climb or crawl anywhere caution if you decide to visit also the big adit do not take small children along the slopes here are quite steep and die leitenhohle wurde in den jahren 1990 1993 von drei schulern in den sommerferien gegraben die damals ca 10 jahre alten jungs wollten den fuchsbau den fuchsgang kann man im inneren der hohle noch sehen nachgraben da das mit dem kinderwerkzeug wirklich eine muhsame arbeit war scheiterte das projekt und so entstanden nur einige wenige meter hohle zum cache der cache ist im hinteren teil der hohle fixiert das soll auch so bleiben damit sich auch nur diejenigen eintragen konnen die sich auch bis zum cache vorwagen also nur wer sich personlich ins logbuch eintragt darf den cache auch loggen man sollte fur dieses vorhaben altere kleidung anziehen da es etwas staubig im inneren der hohle ist eine taschenlampe ist auch dringend notwendig wenn du unter klaustrophobie oder arachnophobie leidest dann solltest du die hohle eher meidendu wirst namlich mit ziemlicher sicherheit ein paar spinnen schmetterlinge und sonstige krabbeltiere im hinteren engen teil der hohle begegnen nun aber viel spass beim suchen the cave was dug by three 10yearold boys in their summer holidays in the years 1990 1993 originally this cave was a foxhole which still can be seen inside digging was hard work for the kids and thats the reason why the cave is not bigger the cache is hidden in the back part of the cave its well fixed to make sure that only the brave people who have the guts to crawl into the cave can write into the logbook keep in mind to wear old clothes you might get dirty and to bring along a torch its not advisable for people suffering from claustrophobia and or arachnophobia to enter the cave have fun finding the cache

una grotta con una bocca di circa 35 metri di larghezza e 10 di altezza con una profondita di circa 20 metri un eccezionale riparo naturale che ancora alcuni anni fa era usato per custodire greggi balma scura e sempre parte del massiccio del roccere e si trova a circa 500 metri est dal monte allinterno sgorga perenne una preziosa sorgente dacqua davanti alla grotta a circa 20 metri iniziano le maestose balconate incise di coppelle dei massi isoardi sopra la grotta numerose le coppelle incise il secondo antropomorfo scoperto proprio nei pressi di questa grotta fa supporre che la stessa fu in quel lontano periodo labitazione dello o degli sciamano o sacerdote o re che si susseguirono in questi luoghi e che molto probabilmente furono gli artefici di quelle tante coppelle e figure presenti nel sito dalla grotta prima di scendere per il ripido sentiero per ritornare a sanna potete proseguire verso laltra cima del monte san bernardo 1625 m passando per un tratto della meravigliosa strada dei cannoni

rzeki zalegaja z kolei holocenskie zwiry i piaski szczegolnie dobrze widoczne w odslonce na polnocnym krancu wsi w warstwach osadow rzecznych tkwia tam glazy przywleczone przez ladolod z przedpola przestrzeni stuleci ksztaltowala sie w nastepujacy sposob mlynow nigdy nie nalezal do wiekszych wsi w regionie i liczyl do poczatku ubieglego stulecia niespelna 100 osob z tendencja spadkowa sytuacja ta zmienila sie wraz z rozwojem we wsi przemyslu papierniczego kiedy ludnosc zaczela rosnac osiagajac w 1933 roku liczbe 164 mieszkancow w 1946 roku dotychczasowi mieszkancy zostali wysiedleni w glab historii mlynowa przez kolejne lata sytuacja ludnosciowa byla ustabilizowana a zaczela sie ona zmniejszac dopiero pod koniec lat 80 xx wieku zjawisko to poglebil brak pracy zwiazany z likwidacja zakladow papierniczych mimo tego sytuacja ludnosciowa wsi jest obecnie ustabilizowana na co wplywa bezposrednie sasiedztwo klodzka historia poczatki wsi mlynow powstal w przelomie bardzkim przez ktory wiodl jeden z najstarszych szlakow handlowych funkcjonujacy juz w epoce brazu szlak bursztynowy mimo tego wies zostala zalozona znacznie pozniej co bylo wynikiem niezbyt dogodnego dla osadnictwa pojawila sie dopiero w 1360 roku i dotyczyla wylacznie sprzedazy przez czeschwitza von tschischwitza von czedliczowi lasu pomiedzy wojborzem a mlynowem rok pozniej wofhard von czedlicz sprzedal wymieniaja nadania poszczegolnych panow wsi w 1399 roku paul molstein podarowal czesc lasu klasztorowi augustianow z klodzka a w rok pozniej uczynil to samo lucas molstein w 1409 roku chlopi z lacznej pod panowaniem habsburgow pod panowaniem habsburgow na ziemi klodzkiej mlynow rozwijal sie wolno na co zlozylo sie jego niesprzyjajace polozenie prawdopodobnie zostal niszczony podczas wojny trzydziestoletniej w 1631 roku mieszkalo tutaj tylko 2 gospodarzy placacych podatki koscielne parafii w wojborzu w panstwie pruskim zywszy rozwoj wsi przypadl na xviii wiek w wyniku wojen slaskich i il y a une nouvelle mission pour toi ferdinand chaine il sagit de neutraliser 9 mines qui ont ete reperees par nos fantassins tu sais quelles peuvent exploser a tout moment donc on compte sur ton experience pour le faire le plus vite possible lidee si tu le souhaites cest que tu te chronometres depuis le parking jusqua la boite finale et inscrire sur le carnet de bord la duree totale ce nest pas obligatoire pour valider cette cache cette mission peut se faire a pied ou a velo precise le sur le carnet noublie pas de relever les indices inscrits sur les logbooks pour la finale

larcoise de 1923 a 1989 fondee en 1923 en bordure de la voie ferree larcoise vinifie puis fait transiter sa production de vin essentiellement par wagons cellier des archers de 1989 a 2016 le nom de larcoise a ete modifie en 1989 sous le nom de cellier des archers nouveau cellier des archers 2016 le cellier des archers renait au bord de la nationale 7 en 2016 avec une nouvelle cave comprenant les dernieres technologies de vinification

changchun water ecological park i the changchun water ecological park opened in 2018 for public the area is an old water purification plant the park has preserved some of its old equipment and buildings the entrance is free visitors have the chance to catch a view to changchuns water culture and the former years of industrialization the park covers an area of about 300 thousand square meters you can find a lot of attractions the cache container is a petling magnetic please have a look at the spoilerpicture beware of muggles

the changchun water ecological park has opened in 2018 for public the area is an old water purification plant the park has preserved some of its old equipment and buildings the entrance is free visitors will have the chance to catch a view to changchuns water culture and the former years of industrialization the park covers an area of about 300 thousand square meters you can find a lot of attractions on the caching route this is a short multi cache the cache container is magnetic all stations except the final are virtual you have to walk about 1 kilometer beware of muggles the stations 1 the cache begins in front of a building with a red star you will find the number of a year below this star the year is a 2 the second stage is at n43deg50a1311 and e125deg20a1623 you are in the nearest of a pump station which number has this station you will find this number at a board in front of this building the number is b 3 the third stage of the cache is at n43deg50ab134 and e125deg20ab446 you will find a board with hints for the policebuilding beside what is the property title number which is written at this board it is a sevendigit number which digit is exactly in the middle of this number this digit is c 4 the final is at n43deg50ac+184 and e125deg20ab531 have a look at the spoiler foto good luck

jest w rybniku takie miejsce ktore jest jednym z etapow szlaku zabytkow techniki to zabytkowa kopalnia wegla ignacy w rybnickiej dzielnicy niewiadom kopalnia ignacy widziana z szarloty krotka historia w 1788 roku pruski minister prowincji slaskiej karol jerzy von hoym utworzyl w rybniku krolewski urzad gorniczohutniczy z jego polecenia w rejonie rybnika zostaly rozpoczete badania geologiczne dzieki ktorym odkryto bardzo bogate zloza wegla ukoronowaniem poszukiwan bylo zalozenie kopalni ktora na jego czesc otrzymala nazwe hoym byla ona wowczas jedyna panstwowa kopalnia w rejonie rybnika w pierwszych dziesiecioleciach kopalnia eksploatowala plytkie poklady wegla w latach 30 xix wieku polaczyla sie z sasiednimi kopalniami sylwester i biertultowy przechodzac w miedzyczasie z rak panstwowych w gwareckie pozniej w sklad tego kombinatu weszly jeszcze kolejne kopalnie laura i carolus wtedy przejal je gornoslaski magnat przemyslowy ksiaze hugo von hohenloheoeringen w 1922 roku rybnik znalazl sie w granicach panstwa polskiego dlatego tez w 1936 nazwe kopalni zmieniono na ignacy na czesc prezydenta ignacego moscickiego podczas ii wojny swiatowej kopalnia funkcjonowala w ramach koncernu hermann goering werke po wojnie zaklad upanstwowiono w latach 60 tworzyl jeden organizm gospodarczy z kopalnia rydultowy wydobycie wegla zakonczono w latach 90 od tej pory pelni funkcje szybow wentylacyjnych dla innych kopaln na szczescie dzieki zaangazowaniu pasjonatow zaklad uchroniono przed unicestwieniem czasy wspolczesne dzis zabytkowa kopalnia ignacy to industrialne centrum kultury ktore umiejetnie laczy funkcje muzealne i atrakcyjne wydarzenia artystyczne i kulturalne dzieki opiece miasta rybnik oraz srodkom europejskim pochodzacym z regionalnego programu operacyjnego wojewodztwa slaskiego kopalnia ignacy ponownie budzi sie do zycia gruntowna rewitalizacje przeszla stolarnia zaadaptowana na cele muzealne i maszynownia szybu glowacki gdzie zwiedzajacy podziwiac moga unikatowa parowa maszyne wyciagowa z 1900 roku zabytkowa kopalnia ignacy nie jest jedynie obiektem muzealnym nie jest to tez typowy skansen gorniczy miejsce przeznaczone jest na szeroko pojeta dzialalnosc muzealnokulturalna zrewitalizowana infrastruktura i przestrzen obiektu pozwala na organizacje przeroznych imprez kulturalnych koncertow pokazow filmowych przedstawien teatralnych tle wybranego obiektu w zaleznosci od ilosci i kierunku padania swiatla masz do wyboru wieze szybowa i budynek nadszybia szybu glowacki wieze cisnien kamien z tablica pamiatkowa od poniedzialku do la grotta della poesia un piccolo paradiso sulla costa del salento a roca di melendugno nel salento esiste un sito archeologico tra i piu suggestivi e misteriosi ditalia la grotta della poesia a circa 20 chilometri da otranto nel paese di roca di melendugno in provincia di lecce esiste un piccolo paradiso che fa parte di uno dei siti archeologici piu suggestivi ditalia e la grotta della poesia e negli ultimi anni e stato preso dassalto dai turisti per lesattezza roca e posizionata tra le localita di san foca e torre dellorso e presenta una costa con scogliere e piccole insenature alcune raggiungibili solo via mare la grotta della poesia e una di queste insenature sicuramente la piu bella e misteriosa con le sue acque cristalline dai colori cangianti tutti i ragazzi salentini sono passati da questa grotta perche solo tuffandosi dalla scogliera nelle acque cristalline sottostanti ci si puo considerare adulti lorigine del nome e ancora fonte di studio ma lipotesi piu accreditata e che forse in passato vi fosse presente una sorgente dove era possibile bere acqua dolce che in greco si dice posia qualcuno vuole vedere una leggenda alla base del nome e racconta di una bellissima principessa che facendo il bagno nelle acque della grotta era dispirazione per cantori e poeti del posto all grotta della poesia si accede tramite una scalinata scavata nella roccia e da quando e stata inserita tra le 10 piscine naturali piu belle ditalia e diventato un posto affollato da curiosi e turisti soprattutto nel mese di agosto ma questo non toglie bellezza al posto sul versante meridionale la grotta e collegata con il mare aperto mentre sul fondo ce un cunicolo sottomarino che la congiunge con la poesia piccola unaltra piscinetta di uguale fascino la grotta della poesia grande e quella della poesia piccola fanno parte del piu ampio parco archeologico di roca vecchia sulle stesse pareti della grotta sono state rinvenute importanti iscrizioni di origine messapica greca e latina che i navigatori incidevano prima dei viaggi in mare verso le coste albanesi e greche piscina naturale una piscina naturale e una formazione naturale o una costruzione umana simile a una piscina con acqua dolce o salata al suo interno e puo essere formata da diversi tipi di roccia lerosione lerosione e un processo naturale di disintegrazione decomposizione trasporto e deposizione di materiale roccioso e suolo che ha agito sulla superficie terrestre sin dal suo inizio esistono diversi tipi di erosione acqua erosiana erosione del vento erosione glaciale erosione biologica erosione della chimica lerosione idrica include alcuni dei principali tipi di erosione dopo tutto lacqua e lagente esterno esistente piu erosivo tra i tipi di erosione dellacqua ci sono erosione delle piogge questo tipo di erosione e causato dallacqua piovana lacqua piovana puo defluire sulla superficie del suolo formando le inondazioni o filtrare nel terreno erosione fluviale lusura del suolo e causata dallacqua del fiume questo processo si verifica grazie alle forti correnti dei fiumi che sono in grado di prelevare frammenti di bordi cambiando cosi i suoi contorni erosione del mare lerosione causata dallacqua marina e chiamata erosione marina lerosione del mare lerosione causata dallacqua del mare e chiamata dallerosione marina o dallabrasione marina ed e uno dei tipi piu comuni e costanti in tutto il pianeta le acque del mare agiscono sui materiali del litorale litorale portandoli attraverso la sua azione chimica e unazione meccanica laspetto del litorale varia a seconda della natura dei materiali rocciosi in essi contenuti durezza composizione chimica e coesione lacqua di mare reagisce chimicamente con alcuni materiali rocciosi che li indossano lazione meccanica dellacqua si fa sentire quando il mare lancia contro la spiaggia rocce di dimensioni variabili con conseguenti fratture nelle rocce costiere generalmente la modalita e in grado di rilevare due tipi di costa la costa dellabrasione o delle scogliere natura alta e accidentata e la spiaggia o magazzino bassa e sabbiosa quando il mare entra in contatto con la fascia costiera nella zona di abrasione della schiena si puo verificare un fenomeno chiamato barriera di ritirata questo processo consiste di quanto segue scava le onde alla base della barriera e diventa instabile a causa della perdita della loro base di appoggio questa instabilita causa la frammentazione e blocchi che cadono i frammenti originano la piattaforma di abrasione intervallo tra il mare e la barriera quando le onde colpiscono la faccia della barriera hanno anche una forza di compressione che agisce perpendicolarmente ad essa se ha delle crepe queste crepe localizzano laria compressa mentre londa si ritira da un processo di decompressione quindi gli interstizi di roccia sono estesi e la roccia si frammenta per convalidare questo earthcache rispondi alle seguenti domande 1 qual e la tipica roccia della costa salentina 2 sulla base delle tue conoscenze sullerosione marina pensi che la piscina naturale della grotta della poesia crescera negli anni a venire se si spiega come e perche 3 stima laltezza della piscina e la sua profondita massima da dove salti 4 stimare la lunghezza del tunnel tra la piscina e il mare 5 facoltativo dato che sono cresciuto qui e ora sono molto lontano una tua foto per farci sognare e la benvenuta mandami le tue risposte e registra il tuo found se avro delle domande ti contattero en la grotta della poesia a small paradise on the coast of salento in roca di melendugno in salento there is one of the most evocative and mysterious archaeological sites in italy the grotta della poesia about 20 kilometers from otranto in the town of roca di melendugno in the province of lecce there is a small paradise that is part of one of the most evocative archaeological sites in italy it is the cave of poetry and in recent years it has been taken by assault by tourists to be precise roca is located between the towns of san foca and torre dellorso and has a coastline with cliffs and small coves some reachable only by sea the grotta della poesia is one of these coves certainly the most beautiful and mysterious with its crystalclear waters of changing colors all the salento children have passed through this cave because only by diving from the cliff into the crystal clear waters below can one consider oneself an adult the origin of the name is still a source of study but the most accepted hypothesis is that perhaps in the past there was a spring where it was possible to drink fresh water which in greek is called posia someone wants to see a legend at the base of the name and tells of a beautiful princess who taking a bath in the waters of the cave was inspired by local singers and poets the grotta della poesia is accessed via a staircase carved into the rock and since it was included among the 10 most beautiful natural pools in italy it has become a place crowded with curious and tourists especially in august but this does not detract beauty in place on the southern side the grotto is connected with the open sea while on the bottom there is a submarine tunnel that joins it with the small poesia another small pool of equal charm the grotta della poesia grande and that of the poesia piccola are part of the larger archaeological park of roca vecchia on the same walls of the cave important inscriptions of messapian greek and latin origins were found which the navigators recorded before traveling to the albanian and greek coasts natural pool a natural pool is a natural formation or a human construction similar to a pool with fresh or salt water in it and can be formed from different types of rock erosion erosion is a natural process of disintegration decomposition transport and deposition of rock material and soil that has acted on the earths surface since its inception there are different types of erosion water erosiana erosion of the wind glacial erosion biological erosion erosion of chemistry water erosion includes some of the main types of erosion after all water is the most erosive existing external agent among the types of water erosion there are rain erosion this type of erosion is caused by rainwater rainwater can flow onto the soil surface forming floods or seep into the ground fluvial erosion the wear of the soil is caused by river water this process occurs thanks to the strong currents of the rivers that are able to take fragments of edges thus changing its contours sea erosion erosion caused by sea water is called marine erosion sea erosion erosion caused by sea water is called by sea erosion or marine abrasion and is one of the most common and constant types across the planet the waters of the sea act on the materials of the coast coast bringing them through its chemical action and mechanical action the appearance of the coast varies according to the nature of the rocky materials contained in them hardness chemical composition and cohesion sea water chemically reacts with some rocky materials that wear them the mechanical action of water is felt when the sea throws rocks of varying sizes against the beach with consequent fractures in the coastal rocks generally the mode is able to detect two types of coast the coast of abrasion or cliffs high and rugged nature and the beach or warehouse low and sandy when the sea comes into contact with the coastal strip in the area of abrasion of the back a phenomenon called retreat barrier may occur this process consists of the following dig the waves at the base of the barrier and become unstable due to the loss of their base of support this instability causes fragmentation and falling blocks the fragments originate the abrasion platform interval between the sea and the barrier when the waves hit the face of the barrier they also have a compressive force that acts perpendicular to it if it has cracks these cracks locate the compressed air as the wave retreats it gives a decompression process therefore the interstices of rock are extended and the rock is fragmented to validate this earthcache answer the following questions 1 what is the type of rock on the salento coast 2 based on your knowledge of marine erosion do you think the natural pool of the cave of poetry will grow in the coming years if so explain how and why 3 estimate the height of the pool and its maximum depth where you jump 4 estimate the length of the tunnel between the pool and the sea 5 optional as i grew up here and now i am very far away a photo of you to make us dream is welcome send me your responses and log found it if i have some questions ill contact you

04072019 cache gelegt die sage zum cache das verwunschene bergwerk von weissbriach zur zeit des dreissigjahrigen krieges fluchteten viele protestanten in die alpenlander einige knappen kamen bis weissbriach und suchten hier schutz vor den verfolgern sie gruben einen tiefen stollen und begannen goldbergbau zu betreiben der bergbau war sehr ergiebig doch es dauerte nicht lange bis die verfolger sie fanden alle knappen gefangen nahmen und das todesurteil uber sie verhangten vor der vollstreckung wurde ihnen die bitte gewahrt noch einmal in den stollen zu fahren das taten die knappen und verwunschten den berg sodass er kein gold mehr lieferte der verwunschene stollen ist noch heute zu sehen der berg selbst enthalt so glaubt zumindest das volk noch gold denn oben beim bauer oassl dringt manchmal wasser aus dem erdreich in den keller es ist silberhaltig und obenauf schwimmt goldschaum

jama v ragovem logu v katastru jam vodena pod stevilko 5831 je vodoravna jama v dolomitnem pobocju nad reko krko na nadmorski visini 170 m kljub temu da je le slabih 5 metrov nad reko krko z njo nima podzemnih povezav dolga je 38 metrov globoka pa je 2 metra po 5 metrih se jama zozi in zniza v rov v jami zivijo tudi podkovnjaki in jamski pajki do jame je nekdaj vodila stezica pred jamo pa je bila klopica od koder je bil lep pogled na mestno jedro leta 2018 je v ragovem logu prislo do vetroloma ki je podrl tudi drevesa nad stezico jamarji so si zato poiskali drugo bolj strmo pot do jame pridemo po strmem skoraj navpicnem pobocju nad reko krko dostop po reki je zaradi blizine jezu prepovedan vhod v jamo je pod velikim podrtim drevesom ki ji zakriva vhod zakladek se nahaja v prvem delu jame tako je dostop mozen le v suhem vremenu obisk v casu razmocenega ali zasnezenega terena ni primeren upostevajte dejstvo da jama ni turisticna jama teren je zelo strm zato je dobra obutev nujna priporocljiva je vrv v jamo vstopate na lastno odgovornost upostevajte oceno tezavnosti terena in do jame ne pristopajte sami jama v ragovem logu is horizontal cave in dolomite rock above river krka the entrance is aproximately 5 meters above the river there is no connection with the river flow it is 38 meters long and 2 meters deep after 5 meters the cave gets smaller and smaller the cave is populated with bats rhinolophidae and spiders there used to be a small path that led to the entrance and a small bench at the entrance with scenic view onto the old town unfortunately a windstorm in 2018 ruined some trees and the path you cannot acces the cave by boat you can access the cave in dry weather the cave is not turistic cave the terrain is very steep rope is recomended you enter the cave at your own risk consider the terrain difficulty

description de la geocache venez visiter einville et son patrimoine salin et culturel une mine de sel a einville existe toujours actuellement elle est surveillee par la societe qui exploite la mine de varangeville en france il ny a plus que celle de varangeville qui est en exploitation un controle de cette mine deinville seffectue toujours periodiquement par une descente par ascenseur dans le puits principal proche de la geocache einvilleaujard la mine de sel saintlaurent des 1871 la mine de sel saintlaurent exploitait le sel gemme par galeries de 10 a 15 m de largeur et de 450 m de hauteur lextraction annuelle etait de 350 000 quintaux utilises dans lindustrie et lagriculture les puits les galeries et la mine etaient eclaires a lelectricite des 1917 cette saline produisait du sel raffine par evaporation cetait une saline importante puisquelle occupait la cinquieme place des salines lorraines elle cessa sa production durant la premiere guerre mondiale entre 1914 et 1917 en revanche ses activites furent tres importantes durant la seconde guerre en raison de la fermeture des salines mosellanes a cette epoque elle employait jusqua 200 saliniers ou mineurs ces hommes etaient des ouvrierspaysans cestadire que leur journee de travail terminee a la saline ils cultivaient jardins et chenevieres parfois ils venaient des villages environnants et ce quel que soit le temps en hiver victime comme tant dautres de restructurations industrielles cette saline cessa ses activites en 1965 kochsalzlosung saintlaurent im 1871 das salzbergwerk betrieben die st lawrence steinsalz galerien aus 10 bis 15 m breit und 450 m hoch die jahresproduktion betrug 350 000 doppelzentner in industrie und landwirtschaft eingesetzt wells galerien und das bergwerk wurden von elektrizitat im jahr 1917 beleuchtet diese salzgrube stellte das durch verdampfung raffinierte salz her das war eine wichtige salzgrube weil sie den funften platz der lothringischen salzgruben besetzte sie horte mit ihrer produktion wahrend des ersten weltkrieges zwischen 1914 und 1917 auf dagegen waren seine tatigkeiten wahrend des zweiten krieges auf grund des verschlusses der mosellanes salzgruben sehr wichtig in dieser epoche verwendete sie bis zu 200 salzbauern oder bergarbeiter diese manner waren arbeiterbauern das heisst dass sie ihr in der salzgrube beendeter arbeitstag garten anbauten und chenevieres manchmal kamen sie umliegende dorfer und das welches zeit im winter auch immer ist opfer wie so viele andere industrieller neustrukturierungen horte diese salzgrube mit ihren tatigkeiten 1965 auf salt mine in st lawrence by 1871 the salt mine in st lawrence operated the rock salt by galleries of 10 to 15 m in width and 450 m in height the annual extraction was 350000 quintals used in industry and agriculture the wells the galleries and the mine were illuminated to electricity for 1917 this saline produced refined salt by evaporation it was a saline important since it occupied the fifth place of the salines hold it ceased its production during the first world war between 1914 and 1917 on the other hand its activities were very important during the second war due to the closure of the salines mosellanes at that time it employed up to 200 saliniers or minors these men were workerspeasants that is to say that their work day is over to the saline they cultivated gardens and chenevieres sometimes they came from the surrounding villages and this whatever the time in winter victim like so many othersto industrial restructuring this saline ceased its activities situato allinterno dello stupendo altopiano coperto di praterie che domina le valli di ospitale e del dardagna rappresenta un esempio unico di torbiera in tutto il nord italia raggiungibile tramite un lungo tracciato sterrato e qui possibile solo per occhi esperti e attenti osservare la pianta carnivora drosera rotundifolia che durante lestate attira insetti di tutte le dimensioni per poi intrappolarli tra le sue spire mentre in primavera ed in autunno e possibile osservare numerose specie di uccelli che qui trovano un oasi dove riposare durante le lunghe migrazioni attorno al lago e molto suggestiva e luogo ideale di passeggiate la grande prateria che ricopre laltipiano ai limiti della quale un enorme faggio secolare sembra trasudare magia magia che e possibile ritrovare nel versante bolognese dove una piccola insenatura della parete rocciosa viene chiamata grotta delle fate perche la leggenda vuole che al sui interno vivano tre fate maligne che attirano durante le giornate nebbiose i viaggiatori allinterno del lago per poi farli affogare molto suggestivo quanto pericoloso a dominare il lago un grande sperone roccioso si propende a sbalzo verso il precipizio chiamato becco dellaquila permette di dominare la valle del dardagna le coordinate vi porteranno davanti allingresso della grotta non ce bisogno di avventurarsi in profondita la cache si trova nella prima stanza e di mediopiccole dimensioni puo contenere i trackable portatevi la penna fonte <url>

en 1935 madeleine fut prise dans la transmission du moulin cest par son tablier quelle fut happee par la machinerie elle sest mise a tourner autour de laxe son frere camille sen est apercu il a jete un sac qui a enraye la meule puis est alle fermer leau ce fut un drame ou la maman fut blessee en secourant sa fille quand elle passait en bas car elle tournait avec la transmission la maman lui tenais la tete on pensait devoir lui coupe la jambe les docteurs bienfait de vresse et millet de paliseul lont operee sur place et platree elise avait promis un voyage a lisieux si sa fille en rechappait deux mois plus tard madeleine etait sur pied ils sont alles a lisieux des scouts venus pendant la guerre avaient laisse une statue de la vierge dans un buisson pres de la grotte la famille gustin promis si la guerre se passait bien de aire une grotte leur voeu fut exauce cyrille laurencis macon de grosfays fit la grotte labbe martin cure de grosfays fut sculpte une autre statue et cest cellela que lon placa dans la grotte qui fut inauguree par mheylen apres la guerre cest notre dame secours des bon chretiens sources un courriel de monsieur yvon barbazon a madame devoghel marie datant du 18 septembre 2018 traduction par google in 1935 madeleine was caught in the transmission of the mill it was by her apron that she was caught by the machinery she began to turn around the axis his brother camille noticed it he threw a bag that stopped the wheel and went to close the water it was a drama in which the mother was wounded while rescuing her daughter when she passed down because she was turning with the transmission the mother held her head we thought we had to cut his leg doctors bienfait de vresse and millet de paliseul operated on the spot and plastered elise had promised a trip to lisieux if her daughter escaped two months later madeleine was on her feet they went to lisieux scouts from the war had left a statue of the virgin in a bush near the cave the gustin family promised if the war went well to be a cave their wish was granted cyrille laurencis mason of grosfays made the cave father martin curate of grosfays was carved another statue and it is the one that was placed in the cave which was inaugurated by mr heylen after the war it is our lady help of the good christians sources an email from yvon barbazon to mrs devoghel marie dated september 18 2018 google translation in 1935 werd madeleine gevangen in de overbrenging van de molen het was door haar schort dat ze werd gevangen door de machines ze begon zich om de as te draaien zijn broer camille merkte het op hij gooide een zak die het stuur stopte en ging het water dichtdoen het was een drama waarin de moeder gewond raakte tijdens het redden van haar dochter toen ze overleed omdat ze draaide met de transmissie hield de moeder haar hoofd vast we dachten dat we zijn been moesten snijden artsen bienfait de vresse en millet de paliseul opereerden ter plaatse en bepleisterd elise had een reis naar lisieux beloofd als haar dochter was ontsnapt twee maanden later stond madeleine op ze gingen naar lisieux verkenners uit de oorlog hadden een beeld van de maagd achtergelaten in een struik nabij de grot de familie gustin beloofde als de oorlog goed ging een grot te zijn hun wens werd ingewilligd cyrille laurencis metselaar van grosfays maakte de grot pater martin curator van grosfays kreeg een ander beeld en het is het beeld dat in de grot werd geplaatst en dat na de oorlog door de heer heylen werd ingewijd het is onze vrouwe hulp van de goede christenen bronnen een email van yvon barbazon naar mevrouw devoghel marie van 18 september 2018 google vertaling im jahr 1935 wurde madeleine in der ubertragung der muhle gefangen an ihrer schurze wurde sie von der maschine erwischt sie begann sich um die achse zu drehen sein bruder camille bemerkte es er warf eine tasche die das rad zum stehen brachte und ging um das wasser zu schliessen es war ein drama in dem die mutter bei der rettung ihrer tochter verletzt wurde als sie gestorben war weil sie sich mit dem getriebe umdrehte hielt die mutter ihren kopf fest wir dachten wir mussten ihm das bein abschneiden die arzte bienfait de vresse und millet de paliseul operierten vor ort und verputzten elise hatte einen ausflug nach lisieux versprochen falls ihre tochter floh zwei monate spater war madeleine auf den beinen sie gingen nach lisieux pfadfinder aus dem krieg hatten eine statue der jungfrau in einem busch in der nahe der hohle zuruckgelassen die familie gustin versprach falls der krieg gut verlaufen sollte eine hohle zu werden ihr wunsch wurde erfullt cyrille laurencis maurer von grosfays machte die hohle pater martin pfarrer von grosfays hat eine weitere statue geschnitzt die sich in der hohle befand die nach dem krieg von herrn heylen eingeweiht wurde es ist die hilfe unserer lieben frau von den guten christen quellen eine email von yvon barbazon an frau devoghel marie vom 18 september 2018 google ubersetzung

english mount etna is located in the eastern part of sicily has a height of about 3300 meters and is the largest and most active volcano in europe in its lava flows are many caves one of them is the lava cave grotta dei tre livelli lava caves are referred to by geologists as primary caves a lava cave is formed as a result of surface solidification of a lava flow during the last stages of its activity a frozen crust may form over still mobile and actively flowing liquid rock as a result of surface cooling a dwindling supply of lava may then cause the molten material to drain out from under this crust and leave long cylindrical tunnels the grotta dei tre livelli is located at an altitude of 1630 m in casa del vescovo in the area of zafferana it is the longest cave of the etna volcano and is considered one of the most imposant caves of catania the entrance is through ingresso basso an artificial cave entrance which was created in 1964 by road works the total length of the grotto is 1150 m and the difference in height 304 m originally snow was collected inside and pressed and conserved in the winter and sold in the summer overall the cave is very well preserved and only collapsed in a few places at the entrances the cavity is divided into three superimposed galleries located on three different levels the 60mlong upper tunnel is quite narrow and part of the ceiling is made of a reinforced concrete slab that carries the provincial road the intermediate tunnel is about 40 m long and the lower gallery has a length of more than 400 m the three levels are connected by small jumps the floor is made of lava and throughout the cave are stalactites that appear as lava stones with a glass surface and interesting protrusions to log this earthcache please answer the following questions 1 when did the grotto originate see information board at the coordinates 2 what is the estimated height and width of the cave entrance ingresso basso 3 describe the color of the walls of the cave tube 4 what is the geological reason for the red white and green spots on the walls of the grotto optional please take a nice picture of yourself at the coordinates you can log the cache immediately i will contact you if your answers were wrong have fun hain90 deutsch der rund 3300 meter hohe atna an der ostkuste siziliens ist der grosste und zugleich aktivste vulkan europas in seinen lavastromen birgt er viele hohlen eine davon ist die lavahohle grotta dei tre livelli lavahohlen werden von den geologen als primarhohlen bezeichnet sie entstehen wenn magma bei vulkanausbruchen an die erdoberflache tritt die dunnflussige lava kuhlt an der oberflache ab und erstarrt da diese oberflachenschicht die lava im inneren gut isoliert bleibt diese flussig und kann abfliessen dabei kann sie sich in altere gesteinsschichten einschneiden und sich so ihren weg durch den untergrund bahnen auf diese weise entstehen rohren und tunnel die bei diesem vorgang teilweise einsturzen der lavastrom transportiert das herabfallende material ab wodurch sich der lavatunnel stetig vergrossert schliesslich entsteht ein weitraumiges verzweigtes system aus gangen und stollen aus der ursprunglichen lavarohre ist eine hohle geworden die grotta dei tre livelli befindet sich in einer hohe von 1630 m in der ortschaft casa del vescovo auf dem gebiet von zafferana und ist die langste hohle des atna und gilt als eine der bedeutendsten hohlen von catania sie wird durch den ingresso basso betreten einen kunstlichen hohleneingang der 1964 durch strassenbauarbeiten geschaffen wurde die gesamtlange der grotte betragt 1150 m und der hohenunterschied ist 304 m ursprunglich wurde schnee im inneren gesammelt und im winter gepresst um ihn im sommer zu erhalten und zu verkaufen insgesamt ist die hohle sehr gut erhalten und nur an wenigen stellen sind einsturze aufgetreten an den eingangen ist der hohlraum in drei ubereinanderliegende galerien unterteilt die sich auf drei verschiedenen ebenen befinden der 60 m lange obere tunnel ist eher schmal und ein teil der decke besteht aus einer stahlbetonplatte die die provinzstrasse tragt der zwischentunnel ist ca 40 m lang und die untere galerie weisst eine lange von mehr als 400 m auf die drei ebenen sind durch kleine sprunge miteinander verbunden der boden besteht aus lava und in der gesamten hohle konnen umgeschmolzene stalaktiten beobachtet werden die als lavastucke mit einer glasoberflache und interessanten vorsprungen erscheinen um diesen earthcache loggen zu durfen beantwortet bitte folgende fragen 1 wann ist die grotte entstanden siehe informationstafel an den angegebenen koordinaten 2 was ist die geschatzte hohe und breite des hohleneingangs ingresso basso 3 beschreibt die farbe der wande der hohle 4 was ist der grund fur die roten weissen und grunen flecken an den wanden der grotte optional bitte macht ein schones bild von euch in der nahe der koordinaten ihr konnt den cache sofort loggen ich melde mich bei euch wenn die antworten falsch waren viel spass hain90 italiano letna si trova nella parte orientale della sicilia ha unaltezza di circa 3300 metri ed e il vulcano piu grande e piu attivo deuropa nelle sue colate laviche vi sono numerose grotte una delle quali e la grotta lavica grotta dei tre livelli le caverne di lava sono indicate dai geologi come grotte primarie una grotta di lava si forma a seguito della solidificazione superficiale di un flusso di lava durante le ultime fasi della sua attivita a causa del raffreddamento della superficie puo formarsi una crosta congelata su roccia liquida ancora mobile e che scorre attivamente una fornitura in diminuzione di lava puo quindi far defluire il materiale fuso da sotto questa crosta e lasciare lunghi tunnel cilindrici la grotta dei tre livelli si trova ad unaltitudine di 1630 m nella casa del vescovo nella zona di zafferana e la grotta piu lunga del vulcano etna ed e considerata una delle grotte piu importanti di catania lingresso e attraverso ingresso basso un ingresso artificiale in grotta che e stato creato nel 1964 da lavori stradali la lunghezza totale della grotta e di 1150 me la differenza di altezza 304 m in origine la neve veniva raccolta allinterno pressata e conservata in inverno e venduta in estate nel complesso la grotta e molto ben conservata e e crollata solo in alcuni punti alle entrate la cavita e divisa in tre gallerie sovrapposte situate su tre diversi livelli la galleria superiore lunga 60 m e piuttosto stretta e parte del soffitto e costituito da una lastra di cemento armato che trasporta la strada provinciale il tunnel intermedio e lungo circa 40 me la galleria inferiore ha una lunghezza di oltre 400 m i tre livelli sono collegati da piccoli salti il pavimento e fatto di lava e in tutta la grotta sono stalattiti che appaiono come pietre laviche con una superficie di vetro e interessanti sporgenze per registrare questearthcache sul giornale di bordo lei deve compiere i compiti seguenti 1 quando e nata la grotta vedi la scheda informativa alle coordinate 2 qual e laltezza e la larghezza stimate dellingresso della grotta ingresso basso 3 descrivi il colore delle pareti del tubo della caverna 4 qual e la ragione geologica delle macchie rosse bianche e verdi sulle pareti della grotta facoltativo per favore fai una bella foto di te stesso alle coordinate e possibile accedere immediatamente alla cache ti contattero solo se le risposte sono sbagliate buon divertimento hain90

le chemin de saintmichel a valmeinier la galerie et la route des mines attention merci de prendre en compte les avertissements inscrits sur la cache 1 saintmichel a valmeinier 1 saintemarguerite attention please consider warnings in the cache 1 saintmichel a valmeinier 1 saintemarguerite bienvenue sur le chemin de saintmichel a valmeinier ce chemin a servi de lieu de passage entre le versant de valmeinier et ses nombreux hameaux et la ville de saintmicheldemaurienne comme disait les anciens les premieres traces cartographiques de ce chemin remontent au 17eme siecle sur les cartes de lepoque bien que la plupart des petits hameaux dissemines sur le versant se soit progressivement agrandis avec le temps la construction de la departementale et la liaison de certains hameaux par les systemes degouts et delectricite la clapiere les fontaines ou les combes scella le destin des hameaux plus en retraits qui perdirent petit a petit leurs habitants jusqua leur abandon quasi complet dans les annees 8090 il ne reste plus de ces petits bameaux que des ruines et quelques chalets retapes et encore utilises ce circuit comporte 18 caches traditionnelles et 1 cache bonus dont les indices sont disseminies sur les 18 autres caches vous naviguerez sur lancien chemin et decouvrirez les differents endroits et secrets de ce versant le circuit complet fait approximativement 8 km et comporte 500 m de denivele positif durant le 19e et le 20e siecle la vallee de la maurienne etait connue pour ses nombreuses infrastructures minieres notamment ses mines de charbon comme cetait le cas audessus du hameau de la saussaz de nombreux enfants et hommes se sont acharnes dans ces mines pour pouvoir vivre ces mines ont ete exploitees jusqua la seconde moitiee du 20e siecle elles sont aujourdhui abandonnees on peut encore retrouver quelques bornes annoncant la limite de la zone dexploitation miniere dans la foret au dessus de la saussaz en plus de mines qui se situent de lautre cote une galerie souterraine a egalement ete creusee ici a la fenetre des fontaines pour permettre la creation dune cheminee dequilibre lors de la construction des systemes dadduction deau pour les systemes hydroelectriques ainsi sous vos pieds circule de leau dans des immenses galeries et les problemes de pression sont eliminees par ce tunnel qui ressort 300 m plus en altitude au lieu dit du champ du bois ou debouche la cheminee

ita la reggia di caserta e un palazzo reale con annesso un parco ubicato a caserta e la residenza reale piu grande al mondo per volume e i proprietari storici sono stati i borbone di napoli oltre a un breve periodo in cui fu abitata dai murat nel 1997 e stata dichiarata dallunesco insieme con lacquedotto di vanvitelli e il complesso di san leucio patrimonio dellumanita grotta misteriosa qui il principe andrea era pronto a convolare a nozze con rosella ragazza bellissima ma di umili origini suo padre infatti era un semplice pescatore di napoli figura ben lontana dalla classe nobile puoi saperne di piu sulla leggenda qui <url> eng the royal palace of caserta italian reggia di caserta is a former royal residence in caserta southern italy constructed by the house of bourbontwo sicilies as their main residence as kings of naples it is one of the largest palaces erected in europe during the 18th century in 1997 the palace was designated a unesco world heritage site its nomination described it as the swan song of the spectacular art of the baroque from which it adopted all the features needed to create the illusions of multidirectional space in terms of volume the royal palace of caserta is the largest royal residence in the world with over 1 million m3 and covering an area of about 160000 m2 secret cave legend has it that the prince andrea was ready to marry rosella the beautiful daughter of a fisherman from naples the marriage however was frowned upon by the women of the neapolitan aristocracy because they all aspiring to take the place of the girl were determined to use all possible means to prevent it in every way so they asked the help of a witch for a spell to prevent the marriage and the witch gave them a cursed rose whose perfume was able to kill instantly more you will find here <url>

ita gli scavi archeologici di cuma hanno restituito i resti dellantica citta di cuma una delle piu antiche colonie greche in italia risalente al 730 ac ed abbandonata nel 1207 quando venne distrutta dalle armate napoletane il sito di cuma esplorato a piu tappe a partire dal 1606 ma in modo sistematico solo dal 1852 e gestito dalla soprintendenza per i beni archeologici di napoli la maggior parte dei reperti recuperati e conservata al museo archeologico nazionale di napoli ed al museo archeologico dei campi flegrei allinterno dellarea urbana si trovano i resti del tempio di apollo il tempio di giove la cripta romana un immenso edificio termale di eta imperiale lanfiteatro e il foro il sito archeologico di cuma e anche famoso per antro della sibilla uno degli oracoli piu conosciuti e consultati del mondo antico le cui predizioni sono ricordate da virgilio in alcuni versi delleneide la grotta della sibilla e accessibile da una piazza sul lato sinistro dellingresso del parco e alta circa 5 metri e lunga oltre 130 metri e stata scoperta nel 1932 e una galleria diritta in tufo lungo la strada ci sono diversi arti su entrambi i lati alcuni sono per lilluminazione e la ventilazione altri sono stati usati in epoca romana come cisterne e poi dai cristiani come luogo di sepoltura e considerato il luogo in cui sibilla cumana ha celebrato il rito delle profezie e necessario acquistare il biglietto per accedere al sito eng the archaeological park of cuma in the campi flegrei area includes the ancient city of cuma a colony of magna graecia it is a place of great interest you can admire the greek walls of the late fifth century bc with subsequent rebuilding of the samnite and roman periods inside the urban area are the remains of the temple of apollo the temple of jupiter the roman crypt an immense spa building of the imperial age the amphitheater and the forum the archaeological site of cuma is also famous for sibyls cave one of the most known and consulted oracles of the ancient world whose predictions are remembered by virgil in some verses of the aeneid the sibilla cave is accessible from a square on the left side of the park entrance it is about 5 meters high and over 130 meters long it was discovered in 1932 it is a straight tunnel in tuff along the way there are several limbs on both sides some are for lighting and ventilation others were used in roman times as cisterns and then by christians as a burial place it is considered the place where sibilla cumana celebrated the rite of prophecies you must buy the ticket to get to the site

la grotta della sinaiolasi trova sotto il passo della colla di casaglialungo un sentiero che porta a razzuolo la grotta fu scavata dallorganizzazzione todt durante il secondo conflitto mondiale ed era utilizzata come magazzino per rifornimenti e munizioni oggi la grotta e parzialmente visitabilein quanto una frana internaha interrotto il proseguimentofino allaltra parte della montagna allinterno della grotta della sinaiolavive il raro geco tritone dal passo della colla fonte dellalpesi prende la stradella a dxa fianco di una struttura pericolantee si arriva ad una grande casa fattoria dellalpe subito prima della casasi svolta nettamente a dx lungo uno stradello in discesaed in breve si arriva alla grotta 10 min circa cit tratta da il mio appennino di fabio 4x4 su alcune carte il sentiero e indicato come strada medievale quello che e certo e che scendendo dalla sinaiola verso razzuolo osservando bene i dintorni si notano vari punti scavati sedi di vecchie trincee della guerra e di lato al sentiero spesso non e difficile scorgere alcune feritoie collegate probabilmente ad altre grotte scavate sul posto la cache richiede un minimo di agilita ed equilibrio

kopalnia powstala w roku 1836 na obrzezach starachowic miasta znajdujacego sie w wojewodztwie swietokrzyskim w bliskim sasiedztwie gor swietokrzyskich w roku 1840 nastapila dalsza rozbudowa kopalni rowniez poprzez wybicie nowej sztolni miejsce to bylo dobrym miejscem zatrudnienia az do roku 1944 kiedy to zloza rudy zelaza znaczaco sie uszczuplily kopalnia majowka zostala zamknieta w roku 1970 gdzie w piekne sloneczne dni wybieraja sie starachowiczanie na rodzinne spacery wokol miasta jest tak duzo atrakcji ze mozliwosci moze byc wiele ale najczesciej wybor jednak pada na wedrowke na kopalnie majowka i spacer po okolicznym lesie miejsce to slynie ze swietnego punktu widokowego w tym przypadku wybaczalne byloby nawet stwierdzenie ze najlepszego w okolicy wchodzac na sam szczyt haldy mozna podziwiac rozprzestrzeniajace sie u naszych stop widoki wbrew pozorom jakby to sie moglo wiekszosci osob wydawac nie widac tylko lasu wokol haldy ale przede wszystkim mozna zobaczyc caly teren otaczajacy starachowice bo widoki rozchodza sie na ponad 50 km bardzo dobrze widac gory swietokrzyskie w tym swiety krzyz lasy ilzeckie i tereny skarzyska kopalnia majowka to nie tylko punkt widokowy ale rowniez czesc niebieskiego szlaku spacerowego szlakami gornikow ktorego poczatek znajduje sie przy muzeum przyrody i techniki w starachowicach i prowadzony jest tak samo jak kiedys biegly tory kolejki waskotorowej az do haldy znajdujacej sie na ul na szlakowisku ktora powstala z wylewanego przez lata zuzla wielkopiecowego kopalnia majowka to miejsce w ktorym krzyzuje sie niebieski szlak razem z zoltym ktory prowadzi od starachowic do ilzy teraz przejdzmy to historii tego miejsca ktora jest nie mniej ciekawa co walory turystyczne tego miejsca poczatek kopalni majowka siega az do roku 1836 z tym ze owczesny sposob wydobycia rud zelaza byl systemem niezorganizowanego kopania dukli i szybikow w 1928 roku zaszla duza zmiana dotyczaca wydobycia w wyniku ktorej powstal szyb centralny nr 1 zwany inaczej majowka 1 kopalnia byla bardzo dobrze prosperujaca instytucja wiec pewnie nikogo nie zdziwi dalsza rozbudowa do roku 1939 powstala majowka 2 a zaraz po niej majowka 3 wybudowanie majowki 4 po wybuchu i wojny swiatowej bylo ostatnim przedsiewzieciem jakie zostalo podjete w ramach rozwoju tejze kopalni wydobywane rudy zelaza byly transportowane do pierwszego starachowickiego wielkiego pieca za pomoca kolejki waskotorowej ktora jest kolejna atrakcja turystyczna starachowic niestety wraz z mijajacymi latami zloza rudy zelaza stopniowo sie zmniejszaly w wyniku czego w latach siedemdziesiatych doszlo do zamkniecia kopalni wszystkie wejscia i szyby zostaly zasypane majac na celu bezpieczenstwo przybywajacych turystow takze chociaz do wnetrza kopalni wejsc nie mozna to wdrapac sie po powstalych w wyniku zasypania haldach juz mozna gdyby jednak taka wspinaczka nie wszystkim wystarczyla to mozna wybrac sie na wedrowke urokliwymi wawozami biegnacymi w strone tychowa zwanymi smugiem pakolowym zrodlo <url> podejscie na punkt widokowy wiaze sie z podejsciem pod gore wybierajac droge w lewo na rozwidleniu jest ostre podejscie ale to najkrotsza trasa la cache se situe a lexterieur de la mine en effet il sagit dun terrain prive vous pouvez observer les vestiges de celleci de lexterieur histoire du lieu cette ancienne mine de zinc exploitee au xixeme siecle a ete fermee et noyee il subsiste des installations de surface abandonnees site 1 batiments de lexploitation et administratif presence dun porche qui ressemble a lentree dune galerie mais la propriete est privee et nonaccessible les haldes se sont reboisees et ne sont presque plus visibles site 2 enfin on note la presence danciennes carrieres a moins dun kilometre au nord ou il est possible dobserver des filons la mine de la poipe a ete exploitee de 1813 a 1907 pour le zinc 15 000 tonnes en ont ete extraites il sagit dun gite filonien des mineraux tels que la cerussite la devilline la dinarite la smithsonite ou encore la sphalerite = blende ont ete recoltes avant sa fermeture et lennoiement de ses galeries il est possible de trouver de la blende et des quartzs fumes sur les terrils site 2 dans lancienne carriere site 3 au niveau de lentree a gauche on observe des filons a quartz barytine et blende qui appartiennent au meme systeme filonien qua la poipe
